verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا أَنفَقُوا لَمْ يُسْرِفُوا وَلَمْ يَقْتُرُوا وَكَانَ بَيْنَ ذَٰلِكَ قَوَامًا
verses.translation: And those who when they expend, are neither extravagant nor sparing, and it is a medium in-between.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَدْعُونَ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ وَلَا يَقْتُلُونَ النَّفْسَ الَّتِي حَرَّمَ اللَّهُ إِلَّا بِالْحَقِّ وَلَا يَزْنُونَ ۚ وَمَن يَفْعَلْ ذَٰلِكَ يَلْقَ أَثَامًا
verses.translation: And those who call not unto anot her god along with Allah and slay not any soul which Allah hath forbidden, save in justification, and commit not fornication. And Whosoever shall do this, Shall incur the meed.

verses.content: يُضَاعَفْ لَهُ الْعَذَابُ يَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ وَيَخْلُدْ فِيهِ مُهَانًا
verses.translation: Multiplied for him shall be the torment on the Day of Resurrection, and he shall therein abide disgraced.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَابَ وَآمَنَ وَعَمِلَ عَمَلًا صَالِحًا فَأُولَـٰئِكَ يُبَدِّلُ اللَّهُ سَيِّئَاتِهِمْ حَسَنَاتٍ ۗ وَكَانَ اللَّهُ غَفُورًا رَّحِيمًا
verses.translation: Save him who repenteth and believeth and worketh righteous work. Then these! for them Allah shall change their vices into virtues. Verily Allah is ever Forgiving, Merciful.

verses.content: وَمَن تَابَ وَعَمِلَ صَالِحًا فَإِنَّهُ يَتُوبُ إِلَى اللَّهِ مَتَابًا
verses.translation: And whosoever repenteth and worketh righteously, then verily he repenteth toward Allah with a true repentance.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ لَا يَشْهَدُونَ الزُّورَ وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِاللَّغْوِ مَرُّوا كِرَامًا
verses.translation: And those who witness not falsehood, and when they pass by some vanity pass by with dignity.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ إِذَا ذُكِّرُوا بِآيَاتِ رَبِّهِمْ لَمْ يَخِرُّوا عَلَيْهَا صُمًّا وَعُمْيَانًا
verses.translation: And those who, when they are admonished by the commands of Allah, fall not down thereat, deaf and blind.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ يَقُولُونَ رَبَّنَا هَبْ لَنَا مِنْ أَزْوَاجِنَا وَذُرِّيَّاتِنَا قُرَّةَ أَعْيُنٍ وَاجْعَلْنَا لِلْمُتَّقِينَ إِمَامًا
verses.translation: And those who say: our Lord bestow on us coolness of eyes from our wives and our offspring, and make us unto the God-fearing a pattern.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ يُجْزَوْنَ الْغُرْفَةَ بِمَا صَبَرُوا وَيُلَقَّوْنَ فِيهَا تَحِيَّةً وَسَلَامًا
verses.translation: Those shall be rewarded with the highest apartment, because they persevered. and therein they shall be met with a greeting and salutation-

verses.content: خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ حَسُنَتْ مُسْتَقَرًّا وَمُقَامًا
verses.translation: Abiders therein: excellent it is as an abode and as a station.

verses.content: قُلْ مَا يَعْبَأُ بِكُمْ رَبِّي لَوْلَا دُعَاؤُكُمْ ۖ فَقَدْ كَذَّبْتُمْ فَسَوْفَ يَكُونُ لِزَامًا
verses.translation: Say thou: my Lord careth not for you were it not for your prayer. whereas ye have even belied, so presently this denial shall come as the cleaving punishment.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ طسم
verses.translation: Ta. Sin Mim.

verses.content: تِلْكَ آيَاتُ الْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: These are the verses of a Book luminous.

verses.content: لَعَلَّكَ بَاخِعٌ نَّفْسَكَ أَلَّا يَكُونُوا مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Belike thou shalt kill thyself with grief because they become not believers.

verses.content: إِن نَّشَأْ نُنَزِّلْ عَلَيْهِم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ آيَةً فَظَلَّتْ أَعْنَاقُهُمْ لَهَا خَاضِعِينَ
verses.translation: If We list, We can send down unto them a sign from the heaven so that their necks would became to it submissive.

verses.content: وَمَا يَأْتِيهِم مِّن ذِكْرٍ مِّنَ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ مُحْدَثٍ إِلَّا كَانُوا عَنْهُ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: And there cometh not unto them any fresh admonition from the Compassionate but they are wont to be there from backsliders.

verses.content: فَقَدْ كَذَّبُوا فَسَيَأْتِيهِمْ أَنبَاءُ مَا كَانُوا بِهِ يَسْتَهْزِئُونَ
verses.translation: So they have surely belied; wherefore anon there shall come unto them the truth of that whereat they were wont to mock.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَرَوْا إِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَمْ أَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا مِن كُلِّ زَوْجٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Observe they not the earth, how much We make to grow therein of every fruitful kind?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily therein is a sign; yet most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: وَإِذْ نَادَىٰ رَبُّكَ مُوسَىٰ أَنِ ائْتِ الْقَوْمَ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: And recall what time thy Lord called unto Musa, saying: go thou unto the wrong-doing people.

verses.content: قَوْمَ فِرْعَوْنَ ۚ أَلَا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: The people of Fir'awn; fear they Me not?

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said: my Lord! verily I fear they shall belie me.

verses.content: وَيَضِيقُ صَدْرِي وَلَا يَنطَلِقُ لِسَانِي فَأَرْسِلْ إِلَىٰ هَارُونَ
verses.translation: And my breast straiteneth, and my tongue moveth not quickly: so send for Harun.

verses.content: وَلَهُمْ عَلَيَّ ذَنبٌ فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.translation: And they have a crime against me, so I fear that they shall slay me.

verses.content: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ فَاذْهَبَا بِآيَاتِنَا ۖ إِنَّا مَعَكُم مُّسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: He said: by no means. so go ye twain with Our signs; verily We shall be with you listening.

verses.content: فَأْتِيَا فِرْعَوْنَ فَقُولَا إِنَّا رَسُولُ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: So go ye twain unto Fir'awn and say: verily we are the apostles of the Lord of the Worlds,

verses.content: أَنْ أَرْسِلْ مَعَنَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Send with us the Children of Isra'il?

verses.content: قَالَ أَلَمْ نُرَبِّكَ فِينَا وَلِيدًا وَلَبِثْتَ فِينَا مِنْ عُمُرِكَ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said: brought we not thee up amongst us as a child? And thou tarriedst amongst us for many years of thy life?

verses.content: وَفَعَلْتَ فَعْلَتَكَ الَّتِي فَعَلْتَ وَأَنتَ مِنَ الْكَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: And thou didst that thy deed which thou didst; and thou art of the ingrates.

verses.content: قَالَ فَعَلْتُهَا إِذًا وَأَنَا مِنَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: He said: I did it then when I was mistaken.

verses.content: فَفَرَرْتُ مِنكُمْ لَمَّا خِفْتُكُمْ فَوَهَبَ لِي رَبِّي حُكْمًا وَجَعَلَنِي مِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: Then I fled from you when I feared you, and my Lord bestowed on me wisdom and made me one of the sent ones.

verses.content: وَتِلْكَ نِعْمَةٌ تَمُنُّهَا عَلَيَّ أَنْ عَبَّدتَّ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: And that favour wherewith thou didst oblige me was that thou hadst enslaved the Children of Isra'il?

verses.content: قَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ وَمَا رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said. and what is the Lord of the worlds?

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُم مُّوقِنِينَ
verses.translation: He said: Lord of the heavens and the earth and whatsoever is in-between, if ye seek to be convinced.

verses.content: قَالَ لِمَنْ حَوْلَهُ أَلَا تَسْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said unto those around him: hear ye not?

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّكُمْ وَرَبُّ آبَائِكُمُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: He said: your Lord and the Lord of your ancient fathers.

verses.content: قَالَ إِنَّ رَسُولَكُمُ الَّذِي أُرْسِلَ إِلَيْكُمْ لَمَجْنُونٌ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said: verily your apostle who hath been sent unto you is mad.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبُّ الْمَشْرِقِ وَالْمَغْرِبِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا ۖ إِن كُنتُمْ تَعْقِلُونَ
verses.translation: He said: Lord of the east and the west and whatsoever is in-between, if ye understand.

verses.content: قَالَ لَئِنِ اتَّخَذْتَ إِلَـٰهًا غَيْرِي لَأَجْعَلَنَّكَ مِنَ الْمَسْجُونِينَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said: if thou wilt take a god other than me, I shall surely place thee among the prisoners.

verses.content: قَالَ أَوَلَوْ جِئْتُكَ بِشَيْءٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: He said: even though I bring unto thee something manifest?

verses.content: قَالَ فَأْتِ بِهِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said: forth with it then, if thou art of the truth- tellers.

verses.content: فَأَلْقَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ ثُعْبَانٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Then he cast down his staff, and lo! it was a serpent manifest.

verses.content: وَنَزَعَ يَدَهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ بَيْضَاءُ لِلنَّاظِرِينَ
verses.translation: And he drew forth his hand, and lo! it was white unto the beholders.

verses.content: قَالَ لِلْمَلَإِ حَوْلَهُ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَسَاحِرٌ عَلِيمٌ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said unto the chiefs around him: verily this is a magician knowing.

verses.content: يُرِيدُ أَن يُخْرِجَكُم مِّنْ أَرْضِكُم بِسِحْرِهِ فَمَاذَا تَأْمُرُونَ
verses.translation: He would drive you out of your land through his magic; what then is it ye command?

verses.content: قَالُوا أَرْجِهْ وَأَخَاهُ وَابْعَثْ فِي الْمَدَائِنِ حَاشِرِينَ
verses.translation: They said: put off him and his brother, and send unto the cities callers.

verses.content: يَأْتُوكَ بِكُلِّ سَحَّارٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Thot they may bring to thee every magician knowing.

verses.content: فَجُمِعَ السَّحَرَةُ لِمِيقَاتِ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: So the magicians were assembled at a set time on a day made known.

verses.content: وَقِيلَ لِلنَّاسِ هَلْ أَنتُم مُّجْتَمِعُونَ
verses.translation: And it was said unto the people: are ye going to assemble.

verses.content: لَعَلَّنَا نَتَّبِعُ السَّحَرَةَ إِن كَانُوا هُمُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: Belike we may follow the magicians if they are the winners?

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَ السَّحَرَةُ قَالُوا لِفِرْعَوْنَ أَئِنَّ لَنَا لَأَجْرًا إِن كُنَّا نَحْنُ الْغَالِبِينَ
verses.translation: Then when the magicians came, they said unto Fir'awn: will there surely be a big hire for us if we are the winners?

verses.content: قَالَ نَعَمْ وَإِنَّكُمْ إِذًا لَّمِنَ الْمُقَرَّبِينَ
verses.translation: He said: yea; and ye shall verily then be of those brought nigh.

verses.content: قَالَ لَهُم مُّوسَىٰ أَلْقُوا مَا أَنتُم مُّلْقُونَ
verses.translation: Musa said unto them: cast whatsoever ye have to cast.

verses.content: فَأَلْقَوْا حِبَالَهُمْ وَعِصِيَّهُمْ وَقَالُوا بِعِزَّةِ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّا لَنَحْنُ الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: Then they cast their cords and their staves, and said: by the might of Fir'awn, verily we! we shall be the winners.

verses.content: فَأَلْقَىٰ مُوسَىٰ عَصَاهُ فَإِذَا هِيَ تَلْقَفُ مَا يَأْفِكُونَ
verses.translation: Then Musa cast down his staff, and lo! it swallowed up that which they had devised.

verses.content: فَأُلْقِيَ السَّحَرَةُ سَاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: Then the magicians flung themselves prostrate.

verses.content: قَالُوا آمَنَّا بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: They said: we believe in the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: رَبِّ مُوسَىٰ وَهَارُونَ
verses.translation: The Lord of Musa and Harun.

verses.content: قَالَ آمَنتُمْ لَهُ قَبْلَ أَنْ آذَنَ لَكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَكَبِيرُكُمُ الَّذِي عَلَّمَكُمُ السِّحْرَ فَلَسَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ ۚ لَأُقَطِّعَنَّ أَيْدِيَكُمْ وَأَرْجُلَكُم مِّنْ خِلَافٍ وَلَأُصَلِّبَنَّكُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: Fir'awn said: ye believed in him ere I gave you leave. Verily he is your chief who hath taught you magic, so ye shall surely come to know. Surely I shall cut off your hands and feet on opposite sides and surely I shall crucify you all.

verses.content: قَالُوا لَا ضَيْرَ ۖ إِنَّا إِلَىٰ رَبِّنَا مُنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: They said: no harm! verily unto our Lord we are to return.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لَنَا رَبُّنَا خَطَايَانَا أَن كُنَّا أَوَّلَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily we long that our Lord shall forgive us our faults because we have been the first of the believers

verses.content: وَأَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ أَنْ أَسْرِ بِعِبَادِي إِنَّكُم مُّتَّبَعُونَ
verses.translation: And We revealed unto Musa saying: go by night with My bondmen verily ye shall be pursued.

verses.content: فَأَرْسَلَ فِرْعَوْنُ فِي الْمَدَائِنِ حَاشِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then Fir'awn sent unto the cities callers:

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَشِرْذِمَةٌ قَلِيلُونَ
verses.translation: Verily these are but a band small.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُمْ لَنَا لَغَائِظُونَ
verses.translation: And verily they have enraged US.

verses.content: وَإِنَّا لَجَمِيعٌ حَاذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And verily we are host well-provided.

verses.content: فَأَخْرَجْنَاهُم مِّن جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Then We drave them forth from gardens and springs.

verses.content: وَكُنُوزٍ وَمَقَامٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: And treasures and a station noble.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ وَأَوْرَثْنَاهَا بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Even so. And We caused the Children of Isra'il to inherit them.

verses.content: فَأَتْبَعُوهُم مُّشْرِقِينَ
verses.translation: Then they pursued them at sunrise.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا تَرَاءَى الْجَمْعَانِ قَالَ أَصْحَابُ مُوسَىٰ إِنَّا لَمُدْرَكُونَ
verses.translation: And when the two parties saw each other, the companions of Musa said: verily we are overtaken.

verses.content: قَالَ كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّ مَعِيَ رَبِّي سَيَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: Musa said: by no means; verily with me is my Lord; He shall guide me.

verses.content: فَأَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ مُوسَىٰ أَنِ اضْرِب بِّعَصَاكَ الْبَحْرَ ۖ فَانفَلَقَ فَكَانَ كُلُّ فِرْقٍ كَالطَّوْدِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Then We revealed unto Musa, saying: smite thou the sea with thy staff. So it became separated, and each part was like unto a cliff mighty.

verses.content: وَأَزْلَفْنَا ثَمَّ الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We brought near thither the others.

verses.content: وَأَنجَيْنَا مُوسَىٰ وَمَن مَّعَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: And We delivered Musa and those with him together.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned the others.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily herein is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: وَاتْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ نَبَأَ إِبْرَاهِيمَ
verses.translation: And recite unto them the story of Ibrahim.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لِأَبِيهِ وَقَوْمِهِ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: When he said unto his father and his people: what worship ye?

verses.content: قَالُوا نَعْبُدُ أَصْنَامًا فَنَظَلُّ لَهَا عَاكِفِينَ
verses.translation: They said: we worship idols, and we are unto them ever devoted

verses.content: قَالَ هَلْ يَسْمَعُونَكُمْ إِذْ تَدْعُونَ
verses.translation: He said: hearken they unto you when ye cry?

verses.content: أَوْ يَنفَعُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَضُرُّونَ
verses.translation: Or, benefit they you or hurt they you?

verses.content: قَالُوا بَلْ وَجَدْنَا آبَاءَنَا كَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said: nay; but we found our fathers doing in this wise.

verses.content: قَالَ أَفَرَأَيْتُم مَّا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: He said: have ye observed that which ye worship

verses.content: أَنتُمْ وَآبَاؤُكُمُ الْأَقْدَمُونَ
verses.translation: Ye and your fathers of old?

verses.content: فَإِنَّهُمْ عَدُوٌّ لِّي إِلَّا رَبَّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Verily they are an enemy unto me, save the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَنِي فَهُوَ يَهْدِينِ
verses.translation: Who hath created me, and He guideth me.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي هُوَ يُطْعِمُنِي وَيَسْقِينِ
verses.translation: He Who feedeth me and giveth me to drink.

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرِضْتُ فَهُوَ يَشْفِينِ
verses.translation: And when I sicken, then He healeth me.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي يُمِيتُنِي ثُمَّ يُحْيِينِ
verses.translation: And He Who shall cause me to die, and then shall quicken me.

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَطْمَعُ أَن يَغْفِرَ لِي خَطِيئَتِي يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And He Who, long, shall forgive me my faults, on the Day of Requital.

verses.content: رَبِّ هَبْ لِي حُكْمًا وَأَلْحِقْنِي بِالصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: My Lord! bestow on me wisdom and join me with the righteous.

verses.content: وَاجْعَل لِّي لِسَانَ صِدْقٍ فِي الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And appoint for me an honourable mention among the posterity

verses.content: وَاجْعَلْنِي مِن وَرَثَةِ جَنَّةِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: And make me one of the inheritors of the Garden of Delight.

verses.content: وَاغْفِرْ لِأَبِي إِنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الضَّالِّينَ
verses.translation: And forgive my father; verily he is of the erring.

verses.content: وَلَا تُخْزِنِي يَوْمَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: And humiliate me not on the Day whereon people shall be raised.

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا يَنفَعُ مَالٌ وَلَا بَنُونَ
verses.translation: The Day whereon will profit neither substance nor sons.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَنْ أَتَى اللَّهَ بِقَلْبٍ سَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Unless it be he, who shall bring unto Allah a whole heart,

verses.content: وَأُزْلِفَتِ الْجَنَّةُ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ
verses.translation: And the Garden shall be brought nigh to the God, fearing.

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِلْغَاوِينَ
verses.translation: And the Fierce Fire shall be made apparent unto the seduced ones.

verses.content: وَقِيلَ لَهُمْ أَيْنَ مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: And it shall be said unto them where is that which ye were wont to worship?

verses.content: مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ هَلْ يَنصُرُونَكُمْ أَوْ يَنتَصِرُونَ
verses.translation: Beside Allah? Can they succour you or succour themselves?

verses.content: فَكُبْكِبُوا فِيهَا هُمْ وَالْغَاوُونَ
verses.translation: Then they shall be hurled therein, they and the seduced ones.

verses.content: وَجُنُودُ إِبْلِيسَ أَجْمَعُونَ
verses.translation: And the hosts of Iblis together.

verses.content: قَالُوا وَهُمْ فِيهَا يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: And they, While contending therein, shall say:

verses.content: تَاللَّهِ إِن كُنَّا لَفِي ضَلَالٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: By Allah, we have indeed been in an error manifest.

verses.content: إِذْ نُسَوِّيكُم بِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: When we equalled you with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: وَمَا أَضَلَّنَا إِلَّا الْمُجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: And none led us astray except the Culprits.

verses.content: فَمَا لَنَا مِن شَافِعِينَ
verses.translation: So none we have as intercessors.

verses.content: وَلَا صَدِيقٍ حَمِيمٍ
verses.translation: Nor any loving friend.

verses.content: فَلَوْ أَنَّ لَنَا كَرَّةً فَنَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Were there for us a return, we would be of the believers.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily herein is a sign, but most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ نُوحٍ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And Nuh's people belied the sent ones.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ نُوحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Nuh said Unto them: fear ye not?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I ask of you no hire therefor; my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.

verses.content: قَالُوا أَنُؤْمِنُ لَكَ وَاتَّبَعَكَ الْأَرْذَلُونَ
verses.translation: They said: shall We believe in thee when the meanest follow thee?

verses.content: قَالَ وَمَا عِلْمِي بِمَا كَانُوا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He said: I have no knowledge of that which they have been Working.

verses.content: إِنْ حِسَابُهُمْ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّي ۖ لَوْ تَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Their reckoning is upon my Lord, if ye but knew.

verses.content: وَمَا أَنَا بِطَارِدِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And I am not to drive away the believers.

verses.content: إِنْ أَنَا إِلَّا نَذِيرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: I am naught but a warner manifest.

verses.content: قَالُوا لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَا نُوحُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمَرْجُومِينَ
verses.translation: They said: if thou desistest not, thou shalt surely be of those stoned.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنَّ قَوْمِي كَذَّبُونِ
verses.translation: He said: my Lord! verily my people have belied me.

verses.content: فَافْتَحْ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَهُمْ فَتْحًا وَنَجِّنِي وَمَن مَّعِيَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So decide Thou between me and them with a decision, and deliver me and those who are with me of the believers.

verses.content: فَأَنجَيْنَاهُ وَمَن مَّعَهُ فِي الْفُلْكِ الْمَشْحُونِ
verses.translation: Wherefore We delivered him and those with him in the laden ark.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَغْرَقْنَا بَعْدُ الْبَاقِينَ
verses.translation: Then We drowned the rest thereafter.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ عَادٌ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The'Aad belied the sent ones.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ هُودٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Hud said Unto them: fear ye not?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I ask of you no hire therefor: my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: أَتَبْنُونَ بِكُلِّ رِيعٍ آيَةً تَعْبَثُونَ
verses.translation: Build ye on every eminence a landmark in vanity?

verses.content: وَتَتَّخِذُونَ مَصَانِعَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَخْلُدُونَ
verses.translation: And take ye for yourselves castles that haply ye may abide.

verses.content: وَإِذَا بَطَشْتُم بَطَشْتُمْ جَبَّارِينَ
verses.translation: And when ye seize, ye seize like unto tyrants.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَاتَّقُوا الَّذِي أَمَدَّكُم بِمَا تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: And fear Him Who hath aided you with that which ye know.

verses.content: أَمَدَّكُم بِأَنْعَامٍ وَبَنِينَ
verses.translation: He hath aided you With Cattle and sons.

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: And gardens and springs.

verses.content: إِنِّي أَخَافُ عَلَيْكُمْ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily I fear for you the torment of a Mighty Day.

verses.content: قَالُوا سَوَاءٌ عَلَيْنَا أَوَعَظْتَ أَمْ لَمْ تَكُن مِّنَ الْوَاعِظِينَ
verses.translation: They said: it is equal unto us whether thou admonishest or art not of the admonishers.

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا خُلُقُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This in but a custom of the ancients.

verses.content: وَمَا نَحْنُ بِمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: And we are not going to be tormented.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَهْلَكْنَاهُمْ ۗ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And they belied him; so We destroyed them. Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord? He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The Thamud belied the sent ones

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ صَالِحٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Salih said unto them: fear ye not?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I ask of you no hire therefor; MY hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: أَتُتْرَكُونَ فِي مَا هَاهُنَا آمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Shall ye be left secure in that which is here before us.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: In gardens and springs.

verses.content: وَزُرُوعٍ وَنَخْلٍ طَلْعُهَا هَضِيمٌ
verses.translation: And corn-fields and palm-trees whereof the spathes are fine?

verses.content: وَتَنْحِتُونَ مِنَ الْجِبَالِ بُيُوتًا فَارِهِينَ
verses.translation: And hew ye out houses in the mountains skilfully! g

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَلَا تُطِيعُوا أَمْرَ الْمُسْرِفِينَ
verses.translation: And obey not the command of the extravagant.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: Who work corruption in the land and rectify not.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مِنَ الْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They said: thou art but one of the bewitched;

verses.content: مَا أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا فَأْتِ بِآيَةٍ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Thou art but a human being like unto us. So bring thou a sign if thou art of the truth-tellers.

verses.content: قَالَ هَـٰذِهِ نَاقَةٌ لَّهَا شِرْبٌ وَلَكُمْ شِرْبُ يَوْمٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: He said: yonder is a she-camel; to her a drink, and to you a drink, each on a day known.

verses.content: وَلَا تَمَسُّوهَا بِسُوءٍ فَيَأْخُذَكُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: And touch her not with ill, lest there take hold of you the torment of a Mighty Day.

verses.content: فَعَقَرُوهَا فَأَصْبَحُوا نَادِمِينَ
verses.translation: Then they hamstrung her; and then they became regretful.

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُمُ الْعَذَابُ ۗ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: So the torment took hold of them: verily herein is a sign, but most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ قَوْمُ لُوطٍ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The people of Lut belied the sent ones.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ أَخُوهُمْ لُوطٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: When their brother Lut said unto them: fear ye not?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And I ask of you no hire there for; my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: أَتَأْتُونَ الذُّكْرَانَ مِنَ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Go ye in, of all creatures, unto the males?

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ مَا خَلَقَ لَكُمْ رَبُّكُم مِّنْ أَزْوَاجِكُم ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ عَادُونَ
verses.translation: And leave ye your spouses your Lord hath created for you? Aye! ye are a people trespassing.

verses.content: قَالُوا لَئِن لَّمْ تَنتَهِ يَا لُوطُ لَتَكُونَنَّ مِنَ الْمُخْرَجِينَ
verses.translation: They said: if thou desistest not, O Lut! thou shalt surely be of those driven forth.

verses.content: قَالَ إِنِّي لِعَمَلِكُم مِّنَ الْقَالِينَ
verses.translation: He said: verily I am of those who abhor your work.

verses.content: رَبِّ نَجِّنِي وَأَهْلِي مِمَّا يَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: My Lord! deliver me and my household from that which they work.

verses.content: فَنَجَّيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: So We delivered him and his household all.

verses.content: إِلَّا عَجُوزًا فِي الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: Save an old woman among the lingerers.

verses.content: ثُمَّ دَمَّرْنَا الْآخَرِينَ
verses.translation: Thereafter We annihilated the rest.

verses.content: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَاءَ مَطَرُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We rained on them a rain. So ill was the rain on those warned?

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily herein is a sign, yet most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: كَذَّبَ أَصْحَابُ الْأَيْكَةِ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: The dwellers of the wood belied the sent ones.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ لَهُمْ شُعَيْبٌ أَلَا تَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: What time Shu'aib, said unto them: fear ye not?

verses.content: إِنِّي لَكُمْ رَسُولٌ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: Verily I am unto you an apostle trusted.

verses.content: فَاتَّقُوا اللَّهَ وَأَطِيعُونِ
verses.translation: So fear Allah, and obey me.

verses.content: وَمَا أَسْأَلُكُمْ عَلَيْهِ مِنْ أَجْرٍ ۖ إِنْ أَجْرِيَ إِلَّا عَلَىٰ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And ask of you no hire therefor; and my hire is but with the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: أَوْفُوا الْكَيْلَ وَلَا تَكُونُوا مِنَ الْمُخْسِرِينَ
verses.translation: Give full measure, and be not of those who cause others to lose.

verses.content: وَزِنُوا بِالْقِسْطَاسِ الْمُسْتَقِيمِ
verses.translation: And weigh with a balance straight.

verses.content: وَلَا تَبْخَسُوا النَّاسَ أَشْيَاءَهُمْ وَلَا تَعْثَوْا فِي الْأَرْضِ مُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: And defraud not people of their things, and commit not corruption on the earth.

verses.content: وَاتَّقُوا الَّذِي خَلَقَكُمْ وَالْجِبِلَّةَ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: So fear Him Who created you and the former generations.

verses.content: قَالُوا إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مِنَ الْمُسَحَّرِينَ
verses.translation: They said: thou art but of the bewitched;

verses.content: وَمَا أَنتَ إِلَّا بَشَرٌ مِّثْلُنَا وَإِن نَّظُنُّكَ لَمِنَ الْكَاذِبِينَ
verses.translation: And thou art but a human being like unto us, and we deem thee to be of the liars.

verses.content: فَأَسْقِطْ عَلَيْنَا كِسَفًا مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ إِن كُنتَ مِنَ الصَّادِقِينَ
verses.translation: So cause thou a fragment of the heaven to fall upon us, if thou art of the truth-tellers.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّي أَعْلَمُ بِمَا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: He. said: My Lord is the Best Knower of that which ye work.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَأَخَذَهُمْ عَذَابُ يَوْمِ الظُّلَّةِ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ عَذَابَ يَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: Thenn they belied him; wherefore there laid hold of -them the torment of day of shadow. Verily it was the torment of a Mighty Day.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً ۖ وَمَا كَانَ أَكْثَرُهُم مُّؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily herein is a sign; but most of them are not believers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thy Lord! He is the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَتَنزِيلُ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And verily it is a revelation of the Lord of the worlds.

verses.content: نَزَلَ بِهِ الرُّوحُ الْأَمِينُ
verses.translation: The Trusted spirit hath brought it down.

verses.content: عَلَىٰ قَلْبِكَ لِتَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: Upon thy heart, that thou mayest be of the warners,

verses.content: بِلِسَانٍ عَرَبِيٍّ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: In plain Arabic speech.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَفِي زُبُرِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And verily it is in the Scriptures of the ancients.

verses.content: أَوَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُمْ آيَةً أَن يَعْلَمَهُ عُلَمَاءُ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ
verses.translation: Is it not a sign unto them that the learned among the Children of Isra'il know it?

verses.content: وَلَوْ نَزَّلْنَاهُ عَلَىٰ بَعْضِ الْأَعْجَمِينَ
verses.translation: And had We revealed it unto any of the ncn-Arabs,

verses.content: فَقَرَأَهُ عَلَيْهِم مَّا كَانُوا بِهِ مُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And he had-read it unto them, even then they would not have been believers therein.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ سَلَكْنَاهُ فِي قُلُوبِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: In this wise have We made way for it into the hearts of the culprits.

verses.content: لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِهِ حَتَّىٰ يَرَوُا الْعَذَابَ الْأَلِيمَ
verses.translation: They will not believe therein until they behold the torment afflictive.

verses.content: فَيَأْتِيَهُم بَغْتَةً وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: It shall come unto them on a sudden, and they shall not perceive.

verses.content: فَيَقُولُوا هَلْ نَحْنُ مُنظَرُونَ
verses.translation: Then they will say: are we to be respited?

verses.content: أَفَبِعَذَابِنَا يَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Seek haste then they with our torment?

verses.content: أَفَرَأَيْتَ إِن مَّتَّعْنَاهُمْ سِنِينَ
verses.translation: Beholdest thou? - if We let them enjoy for years.

verses.content: ثُمَّ جَاءَهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُوعَدُونَ
verses.translation: And then there cometh unto them that which they had been promised.

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا يُمَتَّعُونَ
verses.translation: What shall that which they enjoyed avail them?

verses.content: وَمَا أَهْلَكْنَا مِن قَرْيَةٍ إِلَّا لَهَا مُنذِرُونَ
verses.translation: And We destroyed not a city but it had its warners.

verses.content: ذِكْرَىٰ وَمَا كُنَّا ظَالِمِينَ
verses.translation: By way of admonition, and We have never been oppressors.

verses.content: وَمَا تَنَزَّلَتْ بِهِ الشَّيَاطِينُ
verses.translation: And the satans have not brought it down.

verses.content: وَمَا يَنبَغِي لَهُمْ وَمَا يَسْتَطِيعُونَ
verses.translation: It behoveth them not, nor they can.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ عَنِ السَّمْعِ لَمَعْزُولُونَ
verses.translation: Verily far from hearing are they removed.

verses.content: فَلَا تَدْعُ مَعَ اللَّهِ إِلَـٰهًا آخَرَ فَتَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُعَذَّبِينَ
verses.translation: So call not thou unto anot her god along with Allah, lest thou be of the doomed.

verses.content: وَأَنذِرْ عَشِيرَتَكَ الْأَقْرَبِينَ
verses.translation: And warn thou thy clan, the nearest ones.

verses.content: وَاخْفِضْ جَنَاحَكَ لِمَنِ اتَّبَعَكَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And lower thou thy Wlng Unto those who follow thee as believers.

verses.content: فَإِنْ عَصَوْكَ فَقُلْ إِنِّي بَرِيءٌ مِّمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And if they disobey thee, say thou: verily I am quit of that which ye work.

verses.content: وَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى الْعَزِيزِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: And rely thou upon the Mighty, the Merciful.

verses.content: الَّذِي يَرَاكَ حِينَ تَقُومُ
verses.translation: Who seeth thee when thou standest up

verses.content: وَتَقَلُّبَكَ فِي السَّاجِدِينَ
verses.translation: And thy movements among those who fall prostrate.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ السَّمِيعُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: Verily He! He is the Hearer, the Knower.

verses.content: هَلْ أُنَبِّئُكُمْ عَلَىٰ مَن تَنَزَّلُ الشَّيَاطِينُ
verses.translation: Shall declare unto you upon whom the satans descend!

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ أَفَّاكٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: They descend upon every calumniator, sinner.

verses.content: يُلْقُونَ السَّمْعَ وَأَكْثَرُهُمْ كَاذِبُونَ
verses.translation: Who give ear, and most of them are liars.

verses.content: وَالشُّعَرَاءُ يَتَّبِعُهُمُ الْغَاوُونَ
verses.translation: As for the poets -it is the seduced who follow them.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ أَنَّهُمْ فِي كُلِّ وَادٍ يَهِيمُونَ
verses.translation: Observest thou not, that they Wander about every vale.

verses.content: وَأَنَّهُمْ يَقُولُونَ مَا لَا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: And that they say that which they do not?

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَذَكَرُوا اللَّهَ كَثِيرًا وَانتَصَرُوا مِن بَعْدِ مَا ظُلِمُوا ۗ وَسَيَعْلَمُ الَّذِينَ ظَلَمُوا أَيَّ مُنقَلَبٍ يَنقَلِبُونَ
verses.translation: Save those who believed and worked righteous works and remembered Allah much, and vindicated themselves after they had been wronged. And anon those who do wrong shall come to know with what a translating they shall be translated.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ طس ۚ تِلْكَ آيَاتُ الْقُرْآنِ وَكِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Ta. Sin. These are the verses of the Qur'an and a Book luminous.

verses.content: هُدًى وَبُشْرَىٰ لِلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: A guidance and glad tidings unto the believers.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُقِيمُونَ الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُونَ الزَّكَاةَ وَهُم بِالْآخِرَةِ هُمْ يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: Who establish the prayer and give the poor-rate, and of the Hereafter they are convinced.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ بِالْآخِرَةِ زَيَّنَّا لَهُمْ أَعْمَالَهُمْ فَهُمْ يَعْمَهُونَ
verses.translation: Verily those who believe not in the Hereafter - fairseeming unto them We have made their works, so that they wander perplexed.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ الَّذِينَ لَهُمْ سُوءُ الْعَذَابِ وَهُمْ فِي الْآخِرَةِ هُمُ الْأَخْسَرُونَ
verses.translation: Those are they for whom shall be an evil torment. And in the Hereafter they shall be the greatest losers.

verses.content: وَإِنَّكَ لَتُلَقَّى الْقُرْآنَ مِن لَّدُنْ حَكِيمٍ عَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: And verily thou art receiving the Qur'an) from before the Wise, the Knowing.

verses.content: إِذْ قَالَ مُوسَىٰ لِأَهْلِهِ إِنِّي آنَسْتُ نَارًا سَآتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ آتِيكُم بِشِهَابٍ قَبَسٍ لَّعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
verses.translation: Recall what time Musa said unto his household: verily I perceive a fire afar; I shall forthwith bring you tidings thereof, or bring unto you a brand lighted therefrom, haply ye may warm yourselves.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَهَا نُودِيَ أَن بُورِكَ مَن فِي النَّارِ وَمَنْ حَوْلَهَا وَسُبْحَانَ اللَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Then when he came unto it, he was cried unto Thus; Blest is whosoever is in the fire and whosoever is around it; and hallowed be Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: يَا مُوسَىٰ إِنَّهُ أَنَا اللَّهُ الْعَزِيزُ الْحَكِيمُ
verses.translation: O Musa! verily it is I, Allah, the Mighty the Wise!

verses.content: وَأَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَآهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَانٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَا مُوسَىٰ لَا تَخَفْ إِنِّي لَا يَخَافُ لَدَيَّ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: And cast thou down thy staff. Then when he saw it wriggling as though it were a serpent, he turned in flight and looked not back. O Musa! fear thou not; verily in My presence the sent ones fear not.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن ظَلَمَ ثُمَّ بَدَّلَ حُسْنًا بَعْدَ سُوءٍ فَإِنِّي غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Excepting any who may have done wrong and thereafter changeth evil for good then verily I am Forgiving, Merciful.

verses.content: وَأَدْخِلْ يَدَكَ فِي جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَاءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوءٍ ۖ فِي تِسْعِ آيَاتٍ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَقَوْمِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: And put thy hand into thy bosom, it Shall come forth white, with out hurt: amongst nine signs unto Fir'awn and his people. Verily they have been a people transgressing.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَتْهُمْ آيَاتُنَا مُبْصِرَةً قَالُوا هَـٰذَا سِحْرٌ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: Then when Our signs came unto them illuminating, they said: this is a magic manifest.

verses.content: وَجَحَدُوا بِهَا وَاسْتَيْقَنَتْهَا أَنفُسُهُمْ ظُلْمًا وَعُلُوًّا ۚ فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: And they gainsaid them, out of spite and arrogance, although their souls were convinced thereof. So behold! what hath been the end of the corruptors.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا دَاوُودَ وَسُلَيْمَانَ عِلْمًا ۖ وَقَالَا الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ الَّذِي فَضَّلَنَا عَلَىٰ كَثِيرٍ مِّنْ عِبَادِهِ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And assuredly We vouchsafed unto Daud and Sulaiman a knowledge, and the twain said: praise unto Allah Who hath preferred us above many of His believing bondmen!

verses.content: وَوَرِثَ سُلَيْمَانُ دَاوُودَ ۖ وَقَالَ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّاسُ عُلِّمْنَا مَنطِقَ الطَّيْرِ وَأُوتِينَا مِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ ۖ إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَهُوَ الْفَضْلُ الْمُبِينُ
verses.translation: And Sulaiman inherited from Daud. And he said: O mankind! verily have been taught the diction of we birds, and we have been vcuchsafed of every thing; and verily this is grace manifest.

verses.content: وَحُشِرَ لِسُلَيْمَانَ جُنُودُهُ مِنَ الْجِنِّ وَالْإِنسِ وَالطَّيْرِ فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
verses.translation: And there were gathered unto Sulaiman his hosts of jinns and mankind and birds, and they were set in bands.

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا أَتَوْا عَلَىٰ وَادِ النَّمْلِ قَالَتْ نَمْلَةٌ يَا أَيُّهَا النَّمْلُ ادْخُلُوا مَسَاكِنَكُمْ لَا يَحْطِمَنَّكُمْ سُلَيْمَانُ وَجُنُودُهُ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: Until when they came unto the valley of the ants, an ant said: O ants! enter Your habitations lest Sulaiman and his hosts crush you while they perceive not.

verses.content: فَتَبَسَّمَ ضَاحِكًا مِّن قَوْلِهَا وَقَالَ رَبِّ أَوْزِعْنِي أَنْ أَشْكُرَ نِعْمَتَكَ الَّتِي أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ وَعَلَىٰ وَالِدَيَّ وَأَنْ أَعْمَلَ صَالِحًا تَرْضَاهُ وَأَدْخِلْنِي بِرَحْمَتِكَ فِي عِبَادِكَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: So he smiled, amused at her speech, and said: my Lord! arouse me that I should be thankful for Thy favour wherewith Thou hast favoured me and my parents, and that I should work righteously pleasing Thee, and out of Thy mercy enter me among Thine righteous bondmen.

verses.content: وَتَفَقَّدَ الطَّيْرَ فَقَالَ مَا لِيَ لَا أَرَى الْهُدْهُدَ أَمْ كَانَ مِنَ الْغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: And he sought after the birds and said: what aileth me that I see not the hoopoe; is he among the absentees?

verses.content: لَأُعَذِّبَنَّهُ عَذَابًا شَدِيدًا أَوْ لَأَذْبَحَنَّهُ أَوْ لَيَأْتِيَنِّي بِسُلْطَانٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: Surely I shall torment him with a severe torment, or I shall slaughter him, unless he bringeth unto me a warranty manifest.

verses.content: فَمَكَثَ غَيْرَ بَعِيدٍ فَقَالَ أَحَطتُ بِمَا لَمْ تُحِطْ بِهِ وَجِئْتُكَ مِن سَبَإٍ بِنَبَإٍ يَقِينٍ
verses.translation: Buthe tarried not far, and he said: I have encompassed that which thou hast- not encompassed, and I come unto thee from Saba with a tidings sure.

verses.content: إِنِّي وَجَدتُّ امْرَأَةً تَمْلِكُهُمْ وَأُوتِيَتْ مِن كُلِّ شَيْءٍ وَلَهَا عَرْشٌ عَظِيمٌ
verses.translation: Verily have found a woman ruling over them and she hath been vouchsafed somewhat of everything, and hers is a mighty throne.

verses.content: وَجَدتُّهَا وَقَوْمَهَا يَسْجُدُونَ لِلشَّمْسِ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ وَزَيَّنَ لَهُمُ الشَّيْطَانُ أَعْمَالَهُمْ فَصَدَّهُمْ عَنِ السَّبِيلِ فَهُمْ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: I have found her and her people adoring the sun instead of Allah, and the Satan hath made their works fairseeming unto them, and hath barred them from the way, so they are not guided.

verses.content: أَلَّا يَسْجُدُوا لِلَّهِ الَّذِي يُخْرِجُ الْخَبْءَ فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُخْفُونَ وَمَا تُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: So that they adore not Allah who bringeth forth the hidden in the heavens and the earth, and knoweth that which conceal and that which ye make known.

verses.content: اللَّهُ لَا إِلَـٰهَ إِلَّا هُوَ رَبُّ الْعَرْشِ الْعَظِيمِ ۩
verses.translation: Allah! there is no God but he, the Lord of the Magnificent Throne.

verses.content: قَالَ سَنَنظُرُ أَصَدَقْتَ أَمْ كُنتَ مِنَ الْكَاذِبِينَ
verses.translation: Sulaiman said: we shall see now whether thou hast spoken the truth or whether thou art of the liars.

verses.content: اذْهَب بِّكِتَابِي هَـٰذَا فَأَلْقِهْ إِلَيْهِمْ ثُمَّ تَوَلَّ عَنْهُمْ فَانظُرْ مَاذَا يَرْجِعُونَ
verses.translation: Go thou with this epistle of mine, and cast it down unto them, and turn aside from them, and see how they return.

verses.content: قَالَتْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمَلَأُ إِنِّي أُلْقِيَ إِلَيَّ كِتَابٌ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: She said: O chiefs! verily there hath been cast unto me an honourable epistle.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ مِن سُلَيْمَانَ وَإِنَّهُ بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ
verses.translation: Verily it is from Sulaiman, and verily it is: in the name of Allah, the Compassionate, the Merciful.

verses.content: أَلَّا تَعْلُوا عَلَيَّ وَأْتُونِي مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: Saying: exalt not yourselves against me, and come unto me submissive.

verses.content: قَالَتْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمَلَأُ أَفْتُونِي فِي أَمْرِي مَا كُنتُ قَاطِعَةً أَمْرًا حَتَّىٰ تَشْهَدُونِ
verses.translation: She said: O chiefs! counsel me in my affair. I am wont not to resolve on any affair until ye are present with me.

verses.content: قَالُوا نَحْنُ أُولُو قُوَّةٍ وَأُولُو بَأْسٍ شَدِيدٍ وَالْأَمْرُ إِلَيْكِ فَانظُرِي مَاذَا تَأْمُرِينَ
verses.translation: They said: we are owners of power and owners of great violence, but the command is with thee; see then whatsoever thou shalt command.

verses.content: قَالَتْ إِنَّ الْمُلُوكَ إِذَا دَخَلُوا قَرْيَةً أَفْسَدُوهَا وَجَعَلُوا أَعِزَّةَ أَهْلِهَا أَذِلَّةً ۖ وَكَذَٰلِكَ يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: She said: verily the kings, when they enter a City, despoil it, and make the most powerful inhabitants thereof the most abased; so will they do.

verses.content: وَإِنِّي مُرْسِلَةٌ إِلَيْهِم بِهَدِيَّةٍ فَنَاظِرَةٌ بِمَ يَرْجِعُ الْمُرْسَلُونَ
verses.translation: So verily I am going to send a present unto them, and see with what answer the envoys come back.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَ سُلَيْمَانَ قَالَ أَتُمِدُّونَنِ بِمَالٍ فَمَا آتَانِيَ اللَّهُ خَيْرٌ مِّمَّا آتَاكُم بَلْ أَنتُم بِهَدِيَّتِكُمْ تَفْرَحُونَ
verses.translation: Then when he came unto Sulaiman, he said: are ye going to add riches to me. Then that which Allah hath vouchsafed unto me is better than that which He hath vouchsafed unto you. Aye! it is ye who exult in your present.

verses.content: ارْجِعْ إِلَيْهِمْ فَلَنَأْتِيَنَّهُم بِجُنُودٍ لَّا قِبَلَ لَهُم بِهَا وَلَنُخْرِجَنَّهُم مِّنْهَا أَذِلَّةً وَهُمْ صَاغِرُونَ
verses.translation: Go back unto them. Then surely we shall come unto them with hosts which they cannot withstand, and we shall drive them forth therefrom abased and they shall be humbled.

verses.content: قَالَ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمَلَأُ أَيُّكُمْ يَأْتِينِي بِعَرْشِهَا قَبْلَ أَن يَأْتُونِي مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: He said: O chiefs! which of you will bring unto me her throne, ere they come unto me submitting themselves?

verses.content: قَالَ عِفْرِيتٌ مِّنَ الْجِنِّ أَنَا آتِيكَ بِهِ قَبْلَ أَن تَقُومَ مِن مَّقَامِكَ ۖ وَإِنِّي عَلَيْهِ لَقَوِيٌّ أَمِينٌ
verses.translation: A giant from the jinns said: I shall bring it unto thee ere thou arisest from thy place; verily I am strong for it and trusty.

verses.content: قَالَ الَّذِي عِندَهُ عِلْمٌ مِّنَ الْكِتَابِ أَنَا آتِيكَ بِهِ قَبْلَ أَن يَرْتَدَّ إِلَيْكَ طَرْفُكَ ۚ فَلَمَّا رَآهُ مُسْتَقِرًّا عِندَهُ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِن فَضْلِ رَبِّي لِيَبْلُوَنِي أَأَشْكُرُ أَمْ أَكْفُرُ ۖ وَمَن شَكَرَ فَإِنَّمَا يَشْكُرُ لِنَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَن كَفَرَ فَإِنَّ رَبِّي غَنِيٌّ كَرِيمٌ
verses.translation: The one who had some knowledge of the Book said: I shall bring it unto thee ere thy eye twinkleth. Then when he saw it placed before him, he said: this is of the grace of my Lord that he may prove me whether I give thanks or am ungrateful. Whosoever giveth thanks he only giveth thanks for his own soul; and whosoever is ungrateful then verily my Lord is Self-sufficient, Munificent.

verses.content: قَالَ نَكِّرُوا لَهَا عَرْشَهَا نَنظُرْ أَتَهْتَدِي أَمْ تَكُونُ مِنَ الَّذِينَ لَا يَهْتَدُونَ
verses.translation: He said: disguise for her her throne, that we may see whether she be guided or be of those who are not guided.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَتْ قِيلَ أَهَـٰكَذَا عَرْشُكِ ۖ قَالَتْ كَأَنَّهُ هُوَ ۚ وَأُوتِينَا الْعِلْمَ مِن قَبْلِهَا وَكُنَّا مُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: Then when she arrived, it was said: is thy throne like unto? She said: it is as though it were it; and we have been vouchsafed the knowledge before this, and we have been Muslims.

verses.content: وَصَدَّهَا مَا كَانَت تَّعْبُدُ مِن دُونِ اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّهَا كَانَتْ مِن قَوْمٍ كَافِرِينَ
verses.translation: And that which she was wont to worship instead of Allah hindered her; verily she was of an infidel people.

verses.content: قِيلَ لَهَا ادْخُلِي الصَّرْحَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَأَتْهُ حَسِبَتْهُ لُجَّةً وَكَشَفَتْ عَن سَاقَيْهَا ۚ قَالَ إِنَّهُ صَرْحٌ مُّمَرَّدٌ مِّن قَوَارِيرَ ۗ قَالَتْ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي وَأَسْلَمْتُ مَعَ سُلَيْمَانَ لِلَّهِ رَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: It was said unto her: enter the palace. Then when she saw it,, he deemed it a pool and bared her shanks. He said: verily it is a palace evenly floored with glass. She said: my Lord! verily I wronged my soul, and now submit myself together with Sulaiman unto Allah, the Lord of the Worlds.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ ثَمُودَ أَخَاهُمْ صَالِحًا أَنِ اعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ فَإِذَا هُمْ فَرِيقَانِ يَخْتَصِمُونَ
verses.translation: And assuredly We sent unto the Thamud their brother Saleh saying: worship Allah. Then lo! they became two parties contending.

verses.content: قَالَ يَا قَوْمِ لِمَ تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ قَبْلَ الْحَسَنَةِ ۖ لَوْلَا تَسْتَغْفِرُونَ اللَّهَ لَعَلَّكُمْ تُرْحَمُونَ
verses.translation: He said: O my people! wherefore seek ye to hasten the evil before the good? Wherefore ask ye not forgiveness of Allah, that haply ye may be shewn mercy.

verses.content: قَالُوا اطَّيَّرْنَا بِكَ وَبِمَن مَّعَكَ ۚ قَالَ طَائِرُكُمْ عِندَ اللَّهِ ۖ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تُفْتَنُونَ
verses.translation: They said: we augur ill of thee and of those who are with thee. He said: your augury is with Allah. Aye! ye are a people being tested.

verses.content: وَكَانَ فِي الْمَدِينَةِ تِسْعَةُ رَهْطٍ يُفْسِدُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَلَا يُصْلِحُونَ
verses.translation: And there were nine of a group in the City, who spread corruption in the land and rectified not.

verses.content: قَالُوا تَقَاسَمُوا بِاللَّهِ لَنُبَيِّتَنَّهُ وَأَهْلَهُ ثُمَّ لَنَقُولَنَّ لِوَلِيِّهِ مَا شَهِدْنَا مَهْلِكَ أَهْلِهِ وَإِنَّا لَصَادِقُونَ
verses.translation: They said: swear one to anot her by God that we shall surely fall upon him and his household by night and thereafter we shall surely say unto his heir; We witnessed not the destruction of his household, and verily we are truthtellers.

verses.content: وَمَكَرُوا مَكْرًا وَمَكَرْنَا مَكْرًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: And they plotted a plot, and We plotted a plot, while they perceived it not.

verses.content: فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ مَكْرِهِمْ أَنَّا دَمَّرْنَاهُمْ وَقَوْمَهُمْ أَجْمَعِينَ
verses.translation: So behold thou how was the end of their plotting: verily We annihilated them and their nation all together.

verses.content: فَتِلْكَ بُيُوتُهُمْ خَاوِيَةً بِمَا ظَلَمُوا ۗ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَةً لِّقَوْمٍ يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: So yonder are their houses overturned, for they did wrong. Verily, herein is a sign unto a people who know.

verses.content: وَأَنجَيْنَا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَكَانُوا يَتَّقُونَ
verses.translation: And We delivered those who believed and were wont to fear.

verses.content: وَلُوطًا إِذْ قَالَ لِقَوْمِهِ أَتَأْتُونَ الْفَاحِشَةَ وَأَنتُمْ تُبْصِرُونَ
verses.translation: And Lut! what time he said unto his people: commit ye indecency while ye see?

verses.content: أَئِنَّكُمْ لَتَأْتُونَ الرِّجَالَ شَهْوَةً مِّن دُونِ النِّسَاءِ ۚ بَلْ أَنتُمْ قَوْمٌ تَجْهَلُونَ
verses.translation: Would ye go in lustfully unto men instead of women? Aye! ye are a people addicted to ignorant ways.

verses.content: فَمَا كَانَ جَوَابَ قَوْمِهِ إِلَّا أَن قَالُوا أَخْرِجُوا آلَ لُوطٍ مِّن قَرْيَتِكُمْ ۖ إِنَّهُمْ أُنَاسٌ يَتَطَهَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Then there was no answer of his people save that they said: drive forth the family of Lut from your City, verily they are a people who would be pure!

verses.content: فَأَنجَيْنَاهُ وَأَهْلَهُ إِلَّا امْرَأَتَهُ قَدَّرْنَاهَا مِنَ الْغَابِرِينَ
verses.translation: Then We delivered him and his household save his wife: We destined hers to be of the lingerers.

verses.content: وَأَمْطَرْنَا عَلَيْهِم مَّطَرًا ۖ فَسَاءَ مَطَرُ الْمُنذَرِينَ
verses.translation: And We rained upon them a rain; ill was the rain upon the warned.

verses.content: قُلِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ وَسَلَامٌ عَلَىٰ عِبَادِهِ الَّذِينَ اصْطَفَىٰ ۗ آللَّهُ خَيْرٌ أَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Say thou: All praise unto Allah, and peace upon His bondmen whom He hath Chosen! Is Allah best, or that which they associate?

verses.content: أَمَّنْ خَلَقَ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضَ وَأَنزَلَ لَكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ مَاءً فَأَنبَتْنَا بِهِ حَدَائِقَ ذَاتَ بَهْجَةٍ مَّا كَانَ لَكُمْ أَن تُنبِتُوا شَجَرَهَا ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ قَوْمٌ يَعْدِلُونَ
verses.translation: Is not he best Who hath created the heavens and the earth, and Who sendeth down water for you from the heaven wherewith We cause beauteous orchards to grow up, whereof it was not possible for you to cause the trees to grow up! Is there any god along with Allah! Nay! but they are a people who equalise.

verses.content: أَمَّن جَعَلَ الْأَرْضَ قَرَارًا وَجَعَلَ خِلَالَهَا أَنْهَارًا وَجَعَلَ لَهَا رَوَاسِيَ وَجَعَلَ بَيْنَ الْبَحْرَيْنِ حَاجِزًا ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّهِ ۚ بَلْ أَكْثَرُهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Is not he best Who hath made the earth a fixed abode and placed rivers in the midst thereof and placed Firm mountains thereon, and hath set a barrier between the two seas? IS there any god along with Allah? Nay! but most of them know not.

verses.content: أَمَّن يُجِيبُ الْمُضْطَرَّ إِذَا دَعَاهُ وَيَكْشِفُ السُّوءَ وَيَجْعَلُكُمْ خُلَفَاءَ الْأَرْضِ ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّهِ ۚ قَلِيلًا مَّا تَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Is not he best Who answereth the distressed when he calleth unto Him and removeth the evil, and hath made you the successors in the earth? Is there any god along with Allah? Little ye reflect!

verses.content: أَمَّن يَهْدِيكُمْ فِي ظُلُمَاتِ الْبَرِّ وَالْبَحْرِ وَمَن يُرْسِلُ الرِّيَاحَ بُشْرًا بَيْنَ يَدَيْ رَحْمَتِهِ ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّهِ ۚ تَعَالَى اللَّهُ عَمَّا يُشْرِكُونَ
verses.translation: Is not he best Who guideth you in the darknesses of the land and the sea, and Who sendeth the winds as heralds before His mercy Is there any god along with Allah? Exalted be Allah from all that they associate!

verses.content: أَمَّن يَبْدَأُ الْخَلْقَ ثُمَّ يُعِيدُهُ وَمَن يَرْزُقُكُم مِّنَ السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۗ أَإِلَـٰهٌ مَّعَ اللَّهِ ۚ قُلْ هَاتُوا بُرْهَانَكُمْ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: Is not he best Who originateth creation, and shall thereafter restoreth it, and Who provideth for you from the heaven and the earth? IS there any godl along with Allah? Say thou: bring your proof, if ye are truth-tellers.

verses.content: قُل لَّا يَعْلَمُ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ الْغَيْبَ إِلَّا اللَّهُ ۚ وَمَا يَشْعُرُونَ أَيَّانَ يُبْعَثُونَ
verses.translation: Say thou: none in the heavens and the earth knoweth the Unseen save Allah; nor can they perceive when they will be raised.

verses.content: بَلِ ادَّارَكَ عِلْمُهُمْ فِي الْآخِرَةِ ۚ بَلْ هُمْ فِي شَكٍّ مِّنْهَا ۖ بَلْ هُم مِّنْهَا عَمُونَ
verses.translation: Aye! their knowledge attaineth not to the Hereafter, Aye! they are in doubt thereof. Aye! thereunto they are blind.

verses.content: وَقَالَ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا أَإِذَا كُنَّا تُرَابًا وَآبَاؤُنَا أَئِنَّا لَمُخْرَجُونَ
verses.translation: And those who disbelieve say: when we have become dust, we and our fathers, shall we, for sooth, be brought forth?

verses.content: لَقَدْ وُعِدْنَا هَـٰذَا نَحْنُ وَآبَاؤُنَا مِن قَبْلُ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Assuredly we have been promised this aforetime, we and our fathers. Naught is this but fables of the ancients.

verses.content: قُلْ سِيرُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ فَانظُرُوا كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Say thou: travel in the land and behold what like hath been the end of the culprits.

verses.content: وَلَا تَحْزَنْ عَلَيْهِمْ وَلَا تَكُن فِي ضَيْقٍ مِّمَّا يَمْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And grieve thou not over them nor be straitened because of that which they plot.

verses.content: وَيَقُولُونَ مَتَىٰ هَـٰذَا الْوَعْدُ إِن كُنتُمْ صَادِقِينَ
verses.translation: And they say: when will this Promise be fufilled if ye say sooth?

verses.content: قُلْ عَسَىٰ أَن يَكُونَ رَدِفَ لَكُم بَعْضُ الَّذِي تَسْتَعْجِلُونَ
verses.translation: Say thou: belike close behind you may be some of that which ye would hasten on.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَذُو فَضْلٍ عَلَى النَّاسِ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَشْكُرُونَ
verses.translation: And verily thine Lord is full of grace for mankind, but most of them give not thanks.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَيَعْلَمُ مَا تُكِنُّ صُدُورُهُمْ وَمَا يُعْلِنُونَ
verses.translation: And verily thine Lord knoweth whatsoever their breasts conceal and whatsoever they make known.

verses.content: وَمَا مِنْ غَائِبَةٍ فِي السَّمَاءِ وَالْأَرْضِ إِلَّا فِي كِتَابٍ مُّبِينٍ
verses.translation: And naught there is hidden in the heaven or the earth but it is in a Manifest Book.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا الْقُرْآنَ يَقُصُّ عَلَىٰ بَنِي إِسْرَائِيلَ أَكْثَرَ الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ يَخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: Verily this Qur'an recounteth with truth unto the Children of Isra'il much of that wherein they differ.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةٌ لِّلْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And verily it is a guidance and a mercy unto the believers.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَقْضِي بَيْنَهُم بِحُكْمِهِ ۚ وَهُوَ الْعَزِيزُ الْعَلِيمُ
verses.translation: And verily thine Lord shall decide between them with His judgment, and He is the Mighty, the Knowing.

verses.content: فَتَوَكَّلْ عَلَى اللَّهِ ۖ إِنَّكَ عَلَى الْحَقِّ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: Wherefore put thy trust in Allah; verily thou art on manifest truth.

verses.content: إِنَّكَ لَا تُسْمِعُ الْمَوْتَىٰ وَلَا تُسْمِعُ الصُّمَّ الدُّعَاءَ إِذَا وَلَّوْا مُدْبِرِينَ
verses.translation: Verily thou canst not make the dead hear, nor canst thou make the deaf hear the call when they flee turning their backs.

verses.content: وَمَا أَنتَ بِهَادِي الْعُمْيِ عَن ضَلَالَتِهِمْ ۖ إِن تُسْمِعُ إِلَّا مَن يُؤْمِنُ بِآيَاتِنَا فَهُم مُّسْلِمُونَ
verses.translation: Nor canst thou lead the blind out of their error. Thou canst make none hear save these who believe in Our signs and who have submitted themselves.

verses.content: وَإِذَا وَقَعَ الْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِمْ أَخْرَجْنَا لَهُمْ دَابَّةً مِّنَ الْأَرْضِ تُكَلِّمُهُمْ أَنَّ النَّاسَ كَانُوا بِآيَاتِنَا لَا يُوقِنُونَ
verses.translation: And when the word shall come to be fulfilled concerning them, We shall bring forth a beast of the earth speaking unto them, that the people have not of Our signs been convinced.

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ نَحْشُرُ مِن كُلِّ أُمَّةٍ فَوْجًا مِّمَّن يُكَذِّبُ بِآيَاتِنَا فَهُمْ يُوزَعُونَ
verses.translation: And remind them of the Day whereon We shall Rather from every community a troop of those who belied Our signs, and they shall be held in order.

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ إِذَا جَاءُوا قَالَ أَكَذَّبْتُم بِآيَاتِي وَلَمْ تُحِيطُوا بِهَا عِلْمًا أَمَّاذَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: Until when they shall have come, He Shall say: belied ye My signs when ye encompassed them not in Your knowledge; nay, what else was it that ye have been working?

verses.content: وَوَقَعَ الْقَوْلُ عَلَيْهِم بِمَا ظَلَمُوا فَهُمْ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: And the Word shall be fulfilled concerning them, because they did wrong, and they shall not be able to speak.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَرَوْا أَنَّا جَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِيَسْكُنُوا فِيهِ وَالنَّهَارَ مُبْصِرًا ۚ إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَآيَاتٍ لِّقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Observe they not that We have appointed the night that they may repose therein, and the day sight-giving? Verily herein are signs unto a people who believe.

verses.content: وَيَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَفَزِعَ مَن فِي السَّمَاوَاتِ وَمَن فِي الْأَرْضِ إِلَّا مَن شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ وَكُلٌّ أَتَوْهُ دَاخِرِينَ
verses.translation: And remind them of the Day whereon the trumpet shall be blown, and affrighted will be those who are in the heavens and the earth, save him whom Allah willeth. And all shall come unto Him, lowly.

verses.content: وَتَرَى الْجِبَالَ تَحْسَبُهَا جَامِدَةً وَهِيَ تَمُرُّ مَرَّ السَّحَابِ ۚ صُنْعَ اللَّهِ الَّذِي أَتْقَنَ كُلَّ شَيْءٍ ۚ إِنَّهُ خَبِيرٌ بِمَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: And thou shalt see the mountains thou deemest solid passing away as the passing away of the clouds: the handiwork of Allah Who hath perfected everything. Verily He is Aware of all that ye do.

verses.content: مَن جَاءَ بِالْحَسَنَةِ فَلَهُ خَيْرٌ مِّنْهَا وَهُم مِّن فَزَعٍ يَوْمَئِذٍ آمِنُونَ
verses.translation: Whosoever will bring good shall have better than the worth thereof; and they from the terror of that Day will be secure.

verses.content: وَمَن جَاءَ بِالسَّيِّئَةِ فَكُبَّتْ وُجُوهُهُمْ فِي النَّارِ هَلْ تُجْزَوْنَ إِلَّا مَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And whosoever will bring evil --their faces shall be cast down into the Fire. Are ye being requited aught save that which ye have been working?

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَعْبُدَ رَبَّ هَـٰذِهِ الْبَلْدَةِ الَّذِي حَرَّمَهَا وَلَهُ كُلُّ شَيْءٍ ۖ وَأُمِرْتُ أَنْ أَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُسْلِمِينَ
verses.translation: I am commanded only to worship the Lord of this city which He hath sanctified, -and His is every thing - and I am commanded to be of the Muslims;

verses.content: وَأَنْ أَتْلُوَ الْقُرْآنَ ۖ فَمَنِ اهْتَدَىٰ فَإِنَّمَا يَهْتَدِي لِنَفْسِهِ ۖ وَمَن ضَلَّ فَقُلْ إِنَّمَا أَنَا مِنَ الْمُنذِرِينَ
verses.translation: And that I should recite the Qur'an. And whosoever receiveth guidance, receiveth guidance for his own soul, and as for him who strayeth say thou: I am only of the warners.

verses.content: وَقُلِ الْحَمْدُ لِلَّهِ سَيُرِيكُمْ آيَاتِهِ فَتَعْرِفُونَهَا ۚ وَمَا رَبُّكَ بِغَافِلٍ عَمَّا تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: And say thou: All praise unto Allah! Anon He shall shew you His signs, so that ye will recognize them. And thy Lord is not negligent of that which ye Work.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ طسم
verses.translation: Ta. Sin. Mim.

verses.content: تِلْكَ آيَاتُ الْكِتَابِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: These are verses of the Manifest Book.

verses.content: نَتْلُو عَلَيْكَ مِن نَّبَإِ مُوسَىٰ وَفِرْعَوْنَ بِالْحَقِّ لِقَوْمٍ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: WE recite unto thee of the story of Musa and Fir'awn with truth fora people who believe.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ عَلَا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَجَعَلَ أَهْلَهَا شِيَعًا يَسْتَضْعِفُ طَائِفَةً مِّنْهُمْ يُذَبِّحُ أَبْنَاءَهُمْ وَيَسْتَحْيِي نِسَاءَهُمْ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ مِنَ الْمُفْسِدِينَ
verses.translation: Verily Fir'awn exalted himself in the earth and made the people thereof into sects, weakening a party among them, slaying their sons and letting their women live. Verify he was of the corrupters.

verses.content: وَنُرِيدُ أَن نَّمُنَّ عَلَى الَّذِينَ اسْتُضْعِفُوا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَنَجْعَلَهُمْ أَئِمَّةً وَنَجْعَلَهُمُ الْوَارِثِينَ
verses.translation: And We desired that We should be gracious unto those who were weakened in the land, and We should make them leaders and We should make them the inheritors.

verses.content: وَنُمَكِّنَ لَهُمْ فِي الْأَرْضِ وَنُرِيَ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَامَانَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا مِنْهُم مَّا كَانُوا يَحْذَرُونَ
verses.translation: And We should establish them in the earth, and We should let Fir'awn and Haman and their hostee from them that which they dreaded.

verses.content: وَأَوْحَيْنَا إِلَىٰ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ أَنْ أَرْضِعِيهِ ۖ فَإِذَا خِفْتِ عَلَيْهِ فَأَلْقِيهِ فِي الْيَمِّ وَلَا تَخَافِي وَلَا تَحْزَنِي ۖ إِنَّا رَادُّوهُ إِلَيْكِ وَجَاعِلُوهُ مِنَ الْمُرْسَلِينَ
verses.translation: And We inspired the mother of Musa, saying: suckle him, then when thou fearest for him, cast him into the river and fear not, nor grieve. Verily We are going to restore him unto thee, and shall make him one of the sent ones.

verses.content: فَالْتَقَطَهُ آلُ فِرْعَوْنَ لِيَكُونَ لَهُمْ عَدُوًّا وَحَزَنًا ۗ إِنَّ فِرْعَوْنَ وَهَامَانَ وَجُنُودَهُمَا كَانُوا خَاطِئِينَ
verses.translation: And the household of Fir'awn took him Up, that he should become unto them an enemy and a grief. Verily Fir'awn and Haman and their hosts were sinners.

verses.content: وَقَالَتِ امْرَأَتُ فِرْعَوْنَ قُرَّتُ عَيْنٍ لِّي وَلَكَ ۖ لَا تَقْتُلُوهُ عَسَىٰ أَن يَنفَعَنَا أَوْ نَتَّخِذَهُ وَلَدًا وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: And the wife of Fir'awn said: a comfort unto me and thee slay him not; belike he shall be of benefit to us or we might like him for a son; and they perceived not.

verses.content: وَأَصْبَحَ فُؤَادُ أُمِّ مُوسَىٰ فَارِغًا ۖ إِن كَادَتْ لَتُبْدِي بِهِ لَوْلَا أَن رَّبَطْنَا عَلَىٰ قَلْبِهَا لِتَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And the heart of the mother of Musa became void, and she had wellnigh disclosed him, had We not fortified her heart, that she might remain one of the believers.

verses.content: وَقَالَتْ لِأُخْتِهِ قُصِّيهِ ۖ فَبَصُرَتْ بِهِ عَن جُنُبٍ وَهُمْ لَا يَشْعُرُونَ
verses.translation: And she said unto his sister: follow him. So she watched him from afar; and they perceived not.

verses.content: وَحَرَّمْنَا عَلَيْهِ الْمَرَاضِعَ مِن قَبْلُ فَقَالَتْ هَلْ أَدُلُّكُمْ عَلَىٰ أَهْلِ بَيْتٍ يَكْفُلُونَهُ لَكُمْ وَهُمْ لَهُ نَاصِحُونَ
verses.translation: And We had aforetime forbidden foster-mothers for him; so she said: shall direct you unto a household who will rear him for you and who will be unto him good counsellors.

verses.content: فَرَدَدْنَاهُ إِلَىٰ أُمِّهِ كَيْ تَقَرَّ عَيْنُهَا وَلَا تَحْزَنَ وَلِتَعْلَمَ أَنَّ وَعْدَ اللَّهِ حَقٌّ وَلَـٰكِنَّ أَكْثَرَهُمْ لَا يَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: So We restored him unto his mother that she might be comforted and not grieve, and that she might know that the promise of Allah is true. Yet most of them know not.

verses.content: وَلَمَّا بَلَغَ أَشُدَّهُ وَاسْتَوَىٰ آتَيْنَاهُ حُكْمًا وَعِلْمًا ۚ وَكَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: And when he attained his full strength and became firm, We vouchsafed unto him wisdom and knowledge; and Thus We reward the well- doers.

verses.content: وَدَخَلَ الْمَدِينَةَ عَلَىٰ حِينِ غَفْلَةٍ مِّنْ أَهْلِهَا فَوَجَدَ فِيهَا رَجُلَيْنِ يَقْتَتِلَانِ هَـٰذَا مِن شِيعَتِهِ وَهَـٰذَا مِنْ عَدُوِّهِ ۖ فَاسْتَغَاثَهُ الَّذِي مِن شِيعَتِهِ عَلَى الَّذِي مِنْ عَدُوِّهِ فَوَكَزَهُ مُوسَىٰ فَقَضَىٰ عَلَيْهِ ۖ قَالَ هَـٰذَا مِنْ عَمَلِ الشَّيْطَانِ ۖ إِنَّهُ عَدُوٌّ مُّضِلٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And he entered the City at a time of unawareness of the inhabitants thereof, and he found therein two men fighting, one being of his own party, and the other of his enemies. And he who was of his party, called him for help against him who was of his enemies. So Musa truck him with his fist, and put an end of him. He said: this is of the work of the satan, verily he is an enemy, a misleader manifest.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي ظَلَمْتُ نَفْسِي فَاغْفِرْ لِي فَغَفَرَ لَهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ هُوَ الْغَفُورُ الرَّحِيمُ
verses.translation: He said: my Lord! verily I have wronged my soul, so wherefore forgive me. So He forgave him. Verily He! He is the Forgiving, the Owner of Mercy.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ بِمَا أَنْعَمْتَ عَلَيَّ فَلَنْ أَكُونَ ظَهِيرًا لِّلْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: He said: my Lord! whereas Thou hast favoured me, I shall nevermore be a supporter of the culprits.

verses.content: فَأَصْبَحَ فِي الْمَدِينَةِ خَائِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ فَإِذَا الَّذِي اسْتَنصَرَهُ بِالْأَمْسِ يَسْتَصْرِخُهُ ۚ قَالَ لَهُ مُوسَىٰ إِنَّكَ لَغَوِيٌّ مُّبِينٌ
verses.translation: And in the morning he was in the city fearing and looking about, when lo! he who had asked his succour yesterday was crying out unto him. Musa said: verily thou art a seducer manifest.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا أَنْ أَرَادَ أَن يَبْطِشَ بِالَّذِي هُوَ عَدُوٌّ لَّهُمَا قَالَ يَا مُوسَىٰ أَتُرِيدُ أَن تَقْتُلَنِي كَمَا قَتَلْتَ نَفْسًا بِالْأَمْسِ ۖ إِن تُرِيدُ إِلَّا أَن تَكُونَ جَبَّارًا فِي الْأَرْضِ وَمَا تُرِيدُ أَن تَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُصْلِحِينَ
verses.translation: And when he sought to seize him who was an enemy unto them both, he said: O Musa wouldst thou slay me as thou didst slay a person yesterday? Thou seekest only to be a tyrant in the land, and thou seekest not to be of the reconcilers.

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَجُلٌ مِّنْ أَقْصَى الْمَدِينَةِ يَسْعَىٰ قَالَ يَا مُوسَىٰ إِنَّ الْمَلَأَ يَأْتَمِرُونَ بِكَ لِيَقْتُلُوكَ فَاخْرُجْ إِنِّي لَكَ مِنَ النَّاصِحِينَ
verses.translation: And there came a man from the farthest part of the city, running; he said: O Musa! the chiefs are taking counsel together concerning thee, that they might slay thee; wherefore go forth thou, verily I am unto thee of the admonishers.

verses.content: فَخَرَجَ مِنْهَا خَائِفًا يَتَرَقَّبُ ۖ قَالَ رَبِّ نَجِّنِي مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: So he went forth from thence fearing, looking abcut. He said: my Lord! deliver me from the wrong-doing people.

verses.content: وَلَمَّا تَوَجَّهَ تِلْقَاءَ مَدْيَنَ قَالَ عَسَىٰ رَبِّي أَن يَهْدِيَنِي سَوَاءَ السَّبِيلِ
verses.translation: And when he betook himself toward Madyan, he said: belike my Lord will guide me even way.

verses.content: وَلَمَّا وَرَدَ مَاءَ مَدْيَنَ وَجَدَ عَلَيْهِ أُمَّةً مِّنَ النَّاسِ يَسْقُونَ وَوَجَدَ مِن دُونِهِمُ امْرَأَتَيْنِ تَذُودَانِ ۖ قَالَ مَا خَطْبُكُمَا ۖ قَالَتَا لَا نَسْقِي حَتَّىٰ يُصْدِرَ الرِّعَاءُ ۖ وَأَبُونَا شَيْخٌ كَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: And when he arrived at the water of Madyan, he found there a community of the people watering. And he found, apart from them, two women keeping back their flocks. He said: what aileth you twain! The twain said: we water not until the shepherds have driven away their flocks; and our father is a very old man.

verses.content: فَسَقَىٰ لَهُمَا ثُمَّ تَوَلَّىٰ إِلَى الظِّلِّ فَقَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي لِمَا أَنزَلْتَ إِلَيَّ مِنْ خَيْرٍ فَقِيرٌ
verses.translation: Then he watered their flocks for the twain. Then he turned aside into the shade, and said: my Lord! I verily of the good which Thou mayest send down for me I am needy.

verses.content: فَجَاءَتْهُ إِحْدَاهُمَا تَمْشِي عَلَى اسْتِحْيَاءٍ قَالَتْ إِنَّ أَبِي يَدْعُوكَ لِيَجْزِيَكَ أَجْرَ مَا سَقَيْتَ لَنَا ۚ فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُ وَقَصَّ عَلَيْهِ الْقَصَصَ قَالَ لَا تَخَفْ ۖ نَجَوْتَ مِنَ الْقَوْمِ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: Then there came unto him one of the twain walking bashfully, and said: verily my father calleth for thee, that he may recompense thee with a hire for that thou didst water the flock for us. Then, when he was come unto him and had recounted unto him the whole story, he said: fear not; thou hast escaped from the wrong-doing people.

verses.content: قَالَتْ إِحْدَاهُمَا يَا أَبَتِ اسْتَأْجِرْهُ ۖ إِنَّ خَيْرَ مَنِ اسْتَأْجَرْتَ الْقَوِيُّ الْأَمِينُ
verses.translation: And said one of the twain: O my father! hire him, for the best that thou canst hire is the strong and trustworthy one.

verses.content: قَالَ إِنِّي أُرِيدُ أَنْ أُنكِحَكَ إِحْدَى ابْنَتَيَّ هَاتَيْنِ عَلَىٰ أَن تَأْجُرَنِي ثَمَانِيَ حِجَجٍ ۖ فَإِنْ أَتْمَمْتَ عَشْرًا فَمِنْ عِندِكَ ۖ وَمَا أُرِيدُ أَنْ أَشُقَّ عَلَيْكَ ۚ سَتَجِدُنِي إِن شَاءَ اللَّهُ مِنَ الصَّالِحِينَ
verses.translation: He said: verily I wish I would marry thee to one of these two daughters of mine provided that thou hirest thyself to me for eight years. then if thou completest ten it will de of thine own accord, and I would not make it hard for thee; thou Shalt find me, Allah willing, of the righteous.

verses.content: قَالَ ذَٰلِكَ بَيْنِي وَبَيْنَكَ ۖ أَيَّمَا الْأَجَلَيْنِ قَضَيْتُ فَلَا عُدْوَانَ عَلَيَّ ۖ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ مَا نَقُولُ وَكِيلٌ
verses.translation: Musa said: be that between me and thee: whichsoever of the two terms I shall fulfil, it shall be no harshness to me; and of that which we say Allah is Trustee.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا قَضَىٰ مُوسَى الْأَجَلَ وَسَارَ بِأَهْلِهِ آنَسَ مِن جَانِبِ الطُّورِ نَارًا قَالَ لِأَهْلِهِ امْكُثُوا إِنِّي آنَسْتُ نَارًا لَّعَلِّي آتِيكُم مِّنْهَا بِخَبَرٍ أَوْ جَذْوَةٍ مِّنَ النَّارِ لَعَلَّكُمْ تَصْطَلُونَ
verses.translation: Then when Musa had fulfilled the term, and was journeying with his household, he saw a fire on the side of Tur, and said unto his household: bide ye; verily I see a fire afar, haply I may bring unto you tidings thereon, or a brand out: of the fire, haply ye may warm yourselves.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا أَتَاهَا نُودِيَ مِن شَاطِئِ الْوَادِ الْأَيْمَنِ فِي الْبُقْعَةِ الْمُبَارَكَةِ مِنَ الشَّجَرَةِ أَن يَا مُوسَىٰ إِنِّي أَنَا اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: Then when he was come thereto, he was called from the right side of the valley in the ground blest from the tree: Musa! verily I! I am Allah, the Lord of the worlds;

verses.content: وَأَنْ أَلْقِ عَصَاكَ ۖ فَلَمَّا رَآهَا تَهْتَزُّ كَأَنَّهَا جَانٌّ وَلَّىٰ مُدْبِرًا وَلَمْ يُعَقِّبْ ۚ يَا مُوسَىٰ أَقْبِلْ وَلَا تَخَفْ ۖ إِنَّكَ مِنَ الْآمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And cast thou down thy staff. And when he saw it stirring, as though it were a serpent, he turned in flight and looked not back. O Musa! draw nigh, and fear not; thou art of the secure ones.

verses.content: اسْلُكْ يَدَكَ فِي جَيْبِكَ تَخْرُجْ بَيْضَاءَ مِنْ غَيْرِ سُوءٍ وَاضْمُمْ إِلَيْكَ جَنَاحَكَ مِنَ الرَّهْبِ ۖ فَذَانِكَ بُرْهَانَانِ مِن رَّبِّكَ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ وَمَلَئِهِ ۚ إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا قَوْمًا فَاسِقِينَ
verses.translation: Slip thy hand in thy bosom, it shall come forth white without hurt; and draw back thy arm unto thee for fear. These shall be two proofs from thy Lord unto Fir'awn and his chiefs; verily they have been a people given to transgression.

verses.content: قَالَ رَبِّ إِنِّي قَتَلْتُ مِنْهُمْ نَفْسًا فَأَخَافُ أَن يَقْتُلُونِ
verses.translation: He said: My Lord! verily I have slain a man among them and I fear they shall slay me.

verses.content: وَأَخِي هَارُونُ هُوَ أَفْصَحُ مِنِّي لِسَانًا فَأَرْسِلْهُ مَعِيَ رِدْءًا يُصَدِّقُنِي ۖ إِنِّي أَخَافُ أَن يُكَذِّبُونِ
verses.translation: And My brother Harun! He is more eloquent than I in speech; wherefore send him with me as a support, to corroborate me; verily I fear that they shall belie me.

verses.content: قَالَ سَنَشُدُّ عَضُدَكَ بِأَخِيكَ وَنَجْعَلُ لَكُمَا سُلْطَانًا فَلَا يَصِلُونَ إِلَيْكُمَا ۚ بِآيَاتِنَا أَنتُمَا وَمَنِ اتَّبَعَكُمَا الْغَالِبُونَ
verses.translation: He said: We shall indeed strengthen thine arm with thy brother, and We shall vouchsafe unto you authority, so that they shall not be able to come up to you. Go forth with Our signs! Ye twain and those who follow you, shall be the victors.

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُم مُّوسَىٰ بِآيَاتِنَا بَيِّنَاتٍ قَالُوا مَا هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ مُّفْتَرًى وَمَا سَمِعْنَا بِهَـٰذَا فِي آبَائِنَا الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Then when Musa came unto them with Our manifest signs, they said: this is naught but magic fabricated; and we heard not of this among our fathers of old.

verses.content: وَقَالَ مُوسَىٰ رَبِّي أَعْلَمُ بِمَن جَاءَ بِالْهُدَىٰ مِنْ عِندِهِ وَمَن تَكُونُ لَهُ عَاقِبَةُ الدَّارِ ۖ إِنَّهُ لَا يُفْلِحُ الظَّالِمُونَ
verses.translation: And Musa said: My Lord best knoweth him who bringeth guidance from before Him and him whose will be the happy end of the Abode. Verily the wrong-doers shall not thrive.

verses.content: وَقَالَ فِرْعَوْنُ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمَلَأُ مَا عَلِمْتُ لَكُم مِّنْ إِلَـٰهٍ غَيْرِي فَأَوْقِدْ لِي يَا هَامَانُ عَلَى الطِّينِ فَاجْعَل لِّي صَرْحًا لَّعَلِّي أَطَّلِعُ إِلَىٰ إِلَـٰهِ مُوسَىٰ وَإِنِّي لَأَظُنُّهُ مِنَ الْكَاذِبِينَ
verses.translation: And Fir'awn said: O chiefs! know not of a god for you except me. Wherefore light thou for me, O Haman! clay, and make me a lofty tower that I may ascend unto the God of Musa; and verily I imagine him to be of the liars.

verses.content: وَاسْتَكْبَرَ هُوَ وَجُنُودُهُ فِي الْأَرْضِ بِغَيْرِ الْحَقِّ وَظَنُّوا أَنَّهُمْ إِلَيْنَا لَا يُرْجَعُونَ
verses.translation: And he and his hosts were stiff-necked in the land without right, and imagined that before Us they would not be brought back.

verses.content: فَأَخَذْنَاهُ وَجُنُودَهُ فَنَبَذْنَاهُمْ فِي الْيَمِّ ۖ فَانظُرْ كَيْفَ كَانَ عَاقِبَةُ الظَّالِمِينَ
verses.translation: Wherefore We laid hold of him and his hosts and cast them into the sea. So behold thou what like hath been the end of the wrong- doers!

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَاهُمْ أَئِمَّةً يَدْعُونَ إِلَى النَّارِ ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ لَا يُنصَرُونَ
verses.translation: And We made them leaders calling to the Fire, and on the Day of Resurrection they shall not be succoured.

verses.content: وَأَتْبَعْنَاهُمْ فِي هَـٰذِهِ الدُّنْيَا لَعْنَةً ۖ وَيَوْمَ الْقِيَامَةِ هُم مِّنَ الْمَقْبُوحِينَ
verses.translation: And We caused a curse to follow them in this world, and on the Day of Resurrection they shall be of the castaway.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ آتَيْنَا مُوسَى الْكِتَابَ مِن بَعْدِ مَا أَهْلَكْنَا الْقُرُونَ الْأُولَىٰ بَصَائِرَ لِلنَّاسِ وَهُدًى وَرَحْمَةً لَّعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: And assuredly We vouchsafed the the Scripture unto Musa after We had destroyed the generations of old: enlightenment unto mankind and a guidance and a mercy, that haply they might be admonished.

verses.content: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ الْغَرْبِيِّ إِذْ قَضَيْنَا إِلَىٰ مُوسَى الْأَمْرَ وَمَا كُنتَ مِنَ الشَّاهِدِينَ
verses.translation: And thou wast not on the western side when We decreed the affair unto Musa, and thou wast not of the witnesses.

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِنَّا أَنشَأْنَا قُرُونًا فَتَطَاوَلَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْعُمُرُ ۚ وَمَا كُنتَ ثَاوِيًا فِي أَهْلِ مَدْيَنَ تَتْلُو عَلَيْهِمْ آيَاتِنَا وَلَـٰكِنَّا كُنَّا مُرْسِلِينَ
verses.translation: But We brought forth generations, and prolonged unto them was life; nor wast thou a dweller among the people of Madyan, reciting unto them Our revelations; but it is We who were to send.

verses.content: وَمَا كُنتَ بِجَانِبِ الطُّورِ إِذْ نَادَيْنَا وَلَـٰكِن رَّحْمَةً مِّن رَّبِّكَ لِتُنذِرَ قَوْمًا مَّا أَتَاهُم مِّن نَّذِيرٍ مِّن قَبْلِكَ لَعَلَّهُمْ يَتَذَكَّرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor wast thou beside the Tur when We called; but thou art sent as a mercy from thy Lord, that thou mayest warn a people unto whom no warner came before thee, that haply they might be admonished.

verses.content: وَلَوْلَا أَن تُصِيبَهُم مُّصِيبَةٌ بِمَا قَدَّمَتْ أَيْدِيهِمْ فَيَقُولُوا رَبَّنَا لَوْلَا أَرْسَلْتَ إِلَيْنَا رَسُولًا فَنَتَّبِعَ آيَاتِكَ وَنَكُونَ مِنَ الْمُؤْمِنِينَ
verses.translation: And lest, if an affliction had afflicted them for that which their hands had sent before, they should have said: our Lord! wherefore sent not Thou an apostle unto us that we might have followed Thy revelations and been of the believers!

verses.content: فَلَمَّا جَاءَهُمُ الْحَقُّ مِنْ عِندِنَا قَالُوا لَوْلَا أُوتِيَ مِثْلَ مَا أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ ۚ أَوَلَمْ يَكْفُرُوا بِمَا أُوتِيَ مُوسَىٰ مِن قَبْلُ ۖ قَالُوا سِحْرَانِ تَظَاهَرَا وَقَالُوا إِنَّا بِكُلٍّ كَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Yet when the truth is come unto them from before Us, they say: wherefore hast he not been vouchsafed the like of that which was given unto Musa? Disbelieved they not in that which was given unto Musa aforetime? They say; two magics supporting each other. And they say: verily in all such things we are disbelievers.
