verses.translation: And let Me alone with the beliers, owners of ease: and respite thou them a little.

verses.content: إِنَّ لَدَيْنَا أَنكَالًا وَجَحِيمًا
verses.translation: Verily with us are heavy fetters and Scorch.

verses.content: وَطَعَامًا ذَا غُصَّةٍ وَعَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: And a food that choketh and a torment afflictive.

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الْأَرْضُ وَالْجِبَالُ وَكَانَتِ الْجِبَالُ كَثِيبًا مَّهِيلًا
verses.translation: On a Day whereon the earth and the mountains shall quake, and the mountains shall become a sand-heap poured forth.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَيْكُمْ رَسُولًا شَاهِدًا عَلَيْكُمْ كَمَا أَرْسَلْنَا إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ رَسُولًا
verses.translation: Verily We! We have sent Unto you an apostle, a witness over you, even as We sent Unto Fir'awn an apostle.

verses.content: فَعَصَىٰ فِرْعَوْنُ الرَّسُولَ فَأَخَذْنَاهُ أَخْذًا وَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Then Fir'awn disobeyed the apostle, wherefore We laid hold of him with a painful hold.

verses.content: فَكَيْفَ تَتَّقُونَ إِن كَفَرْتُمْ يَوْمًا يَجْعَلُ الْوِلْدَانَ شِيبًا
verses.translation: How then, if ye disbelieve, shall ye escape, on a Day which shall make children grey-headed.

verses.content: السَّمَاءُ مُنفَطِرٌ بِهِ ۚ كَانَ وَعْدُهُ مَفْعُولًا
verses.translation: And the heaven shall be split there in. His promise needs must be fulfilled.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily this is an admonition; let him therefore, who will, choose a way Unto his Lord.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ يَعْلَمُ أَنَّكَ تَقُومُ أَدْنَىٰ مِن ثُلُثَيِ اللَّيْلِ وَنِصْفَهُ وَثُلُثَهُ وَطَائِفَةٌ مِّنَ الَّذِينَ مَعَكَ ۚ وَاللَّهُ يُقَدِّرُ اللَّيْلَ وَالنَّهَارَ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن لَّن تُحْصُوهُ فَتَابَ عَلَيْكُمْ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنَ الْقُرْآنِ ۚ عَلِمَ أَن سَيَكُونُ مِنكُم مَّرْضَىٰ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يَضْرِبُونَ فِي الْأَرْضِ يَبْتَغُونَ مِن فَضْلِ اللَّهِ ۙ وَآخَرُونَ يُقَاتِلُونَ فِي سَبِيلِ اللَّهِ ۖ فَاقْرَءُوا مَا تَيَسَّرَ مِنْهُ ۚ وَأَقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَآتُوا الزَّكَاةَ وَأَقْرِضُوا اللَّهَ قَرْضًا حَسَنًا ۚ وَمَا تُقَدِّمُوا لِأَنفُسِكُم مِّنْ خَيْرٍ تَجِدُوهُ عِندَ اللَّهِ هُوَ خَيْرًا وَأَعْظَمَ أَجْرًا ۚ وَاسْتَغْفِرُوا اللَّهَ ۖ إِنَّ اللَّهَ غَفُورٌ رَّحِيمٌ
verses.translation: Verily thy Lord knoweth that thou stayest up near two- thirds of the night, Or half thereof, or a third thereof, and also a party of those who are with thee. And Allah measureth the night and the day. He knoweth that ye can compute it not, He hath relented toward you. Wherefore recite now of the Qur'an, so much as is easy. He knoweth that there will be among you some diseased, and others shall be travelling in the land seeking grace of Allah, and others shall be fighting in the way of Allah. Wherefore recite thereof so much as is easy; and establish the prayer and give the poor-rate and lend Unto Allah a goodly loan. Whatsoever good ye shall send on for your souls, ye shall find it with Allah, better and greater in reward. And ask forgiveness of Allah; verily Allah is Forgiving, Merciful.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ يَا أَيُّهَا الْمُدَّثِّرُ
verses.translation: O thou enveloped?

verses.content: قُمْ فَأَنذِرْ
verses.translation: Arise, and warn.

verses.content: وَرَبَّكَ فَكَبِّرْ
verses.translation: And thine Lord magnify!

verses.content: وَثِيَابَكَ فَطَهِّرْ
verses.translation: And thine raiment purify.

verses.content: وَالرُّجْزَ فَاهْجُرْ
verses.translation: And pollution shun.

verses.content: وَلَا تَمْنُن تَسْتَكْثِرُ
verses.translation: And bestow not favour that thou mayest receive more.

verses.content: وَلِرَبِّكَ فَاصْبِرْ
verses.translation: And for the good-will of thy Lord be thou patient.

verses.content: فَإِذَا نُقِرَ فِي النَّاقُورِ
verses.translation: Then when the horn shall be blown,

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَوْمٌ عَسِيرٌ
verses.translation: That shall be - that Day-a day hard.

verses.content: عَلَى الْكَافِرِينَ غَيْرُ يَسِيرٍ
verses.translation: For the infidels, not easy.

verses.content: ذَرْنِي وَمَنْ خَلَقْتُ وَحِيدًا
verses.translation: Let Me alone with him whom I created lonely.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْتُ لَهُ مَالًا مَّمْدُودًا
verses.translation: And for whom I appointed wealth extended.

verses.content: وَبَنِينَ شُهُودًا
verses.translation: And sons present by his side.

verses.content: وَمَهَّدتُّ لَهُ تَمْهِيدًا
verses.translation: And for whom I smoothed everything.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يَطْمَعُ أَنْ أَزِيدَ
verses.translation: And who yet coveteth that shall increase.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ إِنَّهُ كَانَ لِآيَاتِنَا عَنِيدًا
verses.translation: By no means! Verily he hath been Unto Our signs a foe.

verses.content: سَأُرْهِقُهُ صَعُودًا
verses.translation: Anon I shall afflict him with a fearful woe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ فَكَّرَ وَقَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Verily he considered, and devised.

verses.content: فَقُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: Perish he! How moliciously he devised!

verses.content: ثُمَّ قُتِلَ كَيْفَ قَدَّرَ
verses.translation: And again perish he! How maliciously he devised!

verses.content: ثُمَّ نَظَرَ
verses.translation: Then looked he,

verses.content: ثُمَّ عَبَسَ وَبَسَرَ
verses.translation: Then frowned he and scowled.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ وَاسْتَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Then turned he back, and grew stiff-necked.

verses.content: فَقَالَ إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا سِحْرٌ يُؤْثَرُ
verses.translation: Then he said: naught is this but magic from of old;

verses.content: إِنْ هَـٰذَا إِلَّا قَوْلُ الْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: Naught is this but the word of Man.

verses.content: سَأُصْلِيهِ سَقَرَ
verses.translation: Anon shall I roast him into the Scorching Fire.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سَقَرُ
verses.translation: And what knoweth thou that which the Scorching Fire?

verses.content: لَا تُبْقِي وَلَا تَذَرُ
verses.translation: It shall not spare, nor leave.

verses.content: لَوَّاحَةٌ لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: . Scorching the skin.

verses.content: عَلَيْهَا تِسْعَةَ عَشَرَ
verses.translation: Over it are appointed nineteen.

verses.content: وَمَا جَعَلْنَا أَصْحَابَ النَّارِ إِلَّا مَلَائِكَةً ۙ وَمَا جَعَلْنَا عِدَّتَهُمْ إِلَّا فِتْنَةً لِّلَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا لِيَسْتَيْقِنَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَيَزْدَادَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا إِيمَانًا ۙ وَلَا يَرْتَابَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ وَالْمُؤْمِنُونَ ۙ وَلِيَقُولَ الَّذِينَ فِي قُلُوبِهِم مَّرَضٌ وَالْكَافِرُونَ مَاذَا أَرَادَ اللَّهُ بِهَـٰذَا مَثَلًا ۚ كَذَٰلِكَ يُضِلُّ اللَّهُ مَن يَشَاءُ وَيَهْدِي مَن يَشَاءُ ۚ وَمَا يَعْلَمُ جُنُودَ رَبِّكَ إِلَّا هُوَ ۚ وَمَا هِيَ إِلَّا ذِكْرَىٰ لِلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: And We have appointed none but the angels to be wardens of the Fire. And their number we have made only a trial for those who disbelieve, so that those who are vouchsafed the Book may be convinced, and that those who believe may increase in faith, and that those who are vouchsafed the Book and the believers may not doubt, and that those in whose hearts is a disease and the infidels may say: what meaneth Allah by this description! In this wise Allah sendeth astray whomsoever He will, and guideth whomsoever He will. And none knoweth the hosts of thy Lord but He. And it is naught but an admonition Unto man.

verses.content: كَلَّا وَالْقَمَرِ
verses.translation: By no means! By the moon,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذْ أَدْبَرَ
verses.translation: By the night when it with draweth.

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا أَسْفَرَ
verses.translation: By the morning when it brighteneth.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا لَإِحْدَى الْكُبَرِ
verses.translation: Verily it is one of the greatest woes.

verses.content: نَذِيرًا لِّلْبَشَرِ
verses.translation: A warning Unto humankind -

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَتَقَدَّمَ أَوْ يَتَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: A warning Unto him of you who shall go forward or who chooseth to lag behind.

verses.content: كُلُّ نَفْسٍ بِمَا كَسَبَتْ رَهِينَةٌ
verses.translation: Every soul will be a pledge for that which it hath earned,

verses.content: إِلَّا أَصْحَابَ الْيَمِينِ
verses.translation: Save the fellows of the right.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّاتٍ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: In Gardens; they shall be asking,

verses.content: عَنِ الْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: Concerning the culprits:

verses.content: مَا سَلَكَكُمْ فِي سَقَرَ
verses.translation: What led you into the Scorching Fire?

verses.content: قَالُوا لَمْ نَكُ مِنَ الْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: They will say. 'we have not been of those who prayed.

verses.content: وَلَمْ نَكُ نُطْعِمُ الْمِسْكِينَ
verses.translation: And we have not been feeding the poor.

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نَخُوضُ مَعَ الْخَائِضِينَ
verses.translation: And we have been wading with the waders.

verses.content: وَكُنَّا نُكَذِّبُ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And we have been belying the Day of Requital.

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ أَتَانَا الْيَقِينُ
verses.translation: until there came to us the certainty.

verses.content: فَمَا تَنفَعُهُمْ شَفَاعَةُ الشَّافِعِينَ
verses.translation: Then there will not Profit them intercision of the interceders,

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ عَنِ التَّذْكِرَةِ مُعْرِضِينَ
verses.translation: What aileth them, therefore, that they are from the Admonition turning away?

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ حُمُرٌ مُّسْتَنفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: As though they were asses startled."

verses.content: فَرَّتْ مِن قَسْوَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Fleeing away from a lion.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ كُلُّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ أَن يُؤْتَىٰ صُحُفًا مُّنَشَّرَةً
verses.translation: Aye! every one of them desireth that: he should be vouchsafed scrolls expanded.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا يَخَافُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: By no means! Aye, they fear not the Hereafter.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُ تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily this Qur'an is an Admonition.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whosoever willeth may heed it.

verses.content: وَمَا يَذْكُرُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ هُوَ أَهْلُ التَّقْوَىٰ وَأَهْلُ الْمَغْفِرَةِ
verses.translation: And they shall not heed unless Allah Willeth. He is the Lord of piety. and the Lord of forgiveness

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِيَوْمِ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: I swear by the Day of Resurrection.

verses.content: وَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالنَّفْسِ اللَّوَّامَةِ
verses.translation: And I swear by the self-reproaching soul.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَلَّن نَّجْمَعَ عِظَامَهُ
verses.translation: Deemest man that We shall not assemble his bones?

verses.content: بَلَىٰ قَادِرِينَ عَلَىٰ أَن نُّسَوِّيَ بَنَانَهُ
verses.translation: Yea! WE are Able to put together evenly his finger-tips.

verses.content: بَلْ يُرِيدُ الْإِنسَانُ لِيَفْجُرَ أَمَامَهُ
verses.translation: Aye! man desireth that he may sin before him.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُ أَيَّانَ يَوْمُ الْقِيَامَةِ
verses.translation: He asketh: when will the Day of Resurrection be?

verses.content: فَإِذَا بَرِقَ الْبَصَرُ
verses.translation: When, then, the sight shall be confounded.

verses.content: وَخَسَفَ الْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the moon shall be ecliped.

verses.content: وَجُمِعَ الشَّمْسُ وَالْقَمَرُ
verses.translation: And the sun and the moon shall be joined.

verses.content: يَقُولُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ أَيْنَ الْمَفَرُّ
verses.translation: On that Day shall man say: whither is the fleeing.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا وَزَرَ
verses.translation: By no means! NO refuge!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمُسْتَقَرُّ
verses.translation: Unto thy Lord that Day is the recourse.

verses.content: يُنَبَّأُ الْإِنسَانُ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِمَا قَدَّمَ وَأَخَّرَ
verses.translation: To man will be declared on that Day that which he hath sent on and left behind.

verses.content: بَلِ الْإِنسَانُ عَلَىٰ نَفْسِهِ بَصِيرَةٌ
verses.translation: Aye! man against himself shall be an enlightenment.

verses.content: وَلَوْ أَلْقَىٰ مَعَاذِيرَهُ
verses.translation: Although he may put forth his pleas.

verses.content: لَا تُحَرِّكْ بِهِ لِسَانَكَ لِتَعْجَلَ بِهِ
verses.translation: Move not thy tongue therewith that thou mayest hasten therewith.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا جَمْعَهُ وَقُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: Verily upon us is the collecting thereof and the reciting thereof.

verses.content: فَإِذَا قَرَأْنَاهُ فَاتَّبِعْ قُرْآنَهُ
verses.translation: Wherefore when We reciteit, follow thou the reciting thereof.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا بَيَانَهُ
verses.translation: And thereafter verily upon us is is the expounding thereof.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily ye love the Herein.

verses.content: وَتَذَرُونَ الْآخِرَةَ
verses.translation: And leave the Hereafter.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاضِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Countenances on that Day shall be resplendent,

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّهَا نَاظِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Looking toward their Lord.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ بَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: And countenances on that Day shall be scowling.

verses.content: تَظُنُّ أَن يُفْعَلَ بِهَا فَاقِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Imagining that there will befall them a waiste-breaking calomity.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا بَلَغَتِ التَّرَاقِيَ
verses.translation: By no means! When it cometh up to he collar-bone.

verses.content: وَقِيلَ مَنْ ۜ رَاقٍ
verses.translation: And it is cried. who can charm?

verses.content: وَظَنَّ أَنَّهُ الْفِرَاقُ
verses.translation: And he bethinketh that it is the time of parting.

verses.content: وَالْتَفَّتِ السَّاقُ بِالسَّاقِ
verses.translation: And one shank is entangled with the other shank.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ يَوْمَئِذٍ الْمَسَاقُ
verses.translation: Unto thy Lord that Day is the drive.

verses.content: فَلَا صَدَّقَ وَلَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He neither believed nor prayed,

verses.content: وَلَـٰكِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: But he belied and turned away.

verses.content: ثُمَّ ذَهَبَ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ يَتَمَطَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he departed Unto his house hold conceitedly.

verses.content: أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Woe Unto thee; woe!

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَوْلَىٰ لَكَ فَأَوْلَىٰ
verses.translation: Again, woe Unto thee, woe!

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ الْإِنسَانُ أَن يُتْرَكَ سُدًى
verses.translation: Deemest man that he is to be left uncontrolled?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَكُ نُطْفَةً مِّن مَّنِيٍّ يُمْنَىٰ
verses.translation: Was he not a sperm of emission emitted?

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ عَلَقَةً فَخَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then he became a clot; then He created him and formed him.

verses.content: فَجَعَلَ مِنْهُ الزَّوْجَيْنِ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: And made of him the two sexes, male and female.

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ ذَٰلِكَ بِقَادِرٍ عَلَىٰ أَن يُحْيِيَ الْمَوْتَىٰ
verses.translation: Is not That One then Able to quicken the dead?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَىٰ عَلَى الْإِنسَانِ حِينٌ مِّنَ الدَّهْرِ لَمْ يَكُن شَيْئًا مَّذْكُورًا
verses.translation: Surely there hath come upon man a space of time when he was not a thing worth mentioning.

verses.content: إِنَّا خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ مِن نُّطْفَةٍ أَمْشَاجٍ نَّبْتَلِيهِ فَجَعَلْنَاهُ سَمِيعًا بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily We! We created man from a sperm of mixtures, that We might prove him, wherefore We made him hearing, seeing.

verses.content: إِنَّا هَدَيْنَاهُ السَّبِيلَ إِمَّا شَاكِرًا وَإِمَّا كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Verily We! We shewed him the way; then he becometh either thankful or ingrate.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَعْتَدْنَا لِلْكَافِرِينَ سَلَاسِلَ وَأَغْلَالًا وَسَعِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily We! We have gotten ready for the infidels chains and collars and a Blaze.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ يَشْرَبُونَ مِن كَأْسٍ كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا كَافُورًا
verses.translation: Verily the pious shall drink of a cup whereof the admixture is like Unto camphor.

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا عِبَادُ اللَّهِ يُفَجِّرُونَهَا تَفْجِيرًا
verses.translation: From a fountain whence the bondmen of Allah will drink, causing it to gush abundantly.

verses.content: يُوفُونَ بِالنَّذْرِ وَيَخَافُونَ يَوْمًا كَانَ شَرُّهُ مُسْتَطِيرًا
verses.translation: They fulfill their vow and dread a Day the evil whereof shall be widespreading.

verses.content: وَيُطْعِمُونَ الطَّعَامَ عَلَىٰ حُبِّهِ مِسْكِينًا وَيَتِيمًا وَأَسِيرًا
verses.translation: And they feed with food, for love of Him, the needy, and the orphan and the captive.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا نُطْعِمُكُمْ لِوَجْهِ اللَّهِ لَا نُرِيدُ مِنكُمْ جَزَاءً وَلَا شُكُورًا
verses.translation: Saying: we feed you only for the sake of Allah; we desire not from you any recompense or thanks.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَخَافُ مِن رَّبِّنَا يَوْمًا عَبُوسًا قَمْطَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Verily we dread from our Lord a Day grim and distressful.

verses.content: فَوَقَاهُمُ اللَّهُ شَرَّ ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمِ وَلَقَّاهُمْ نَضْرَةً وَسُرُورًا
verses.translation: Wherefore Allah shall preserve them from the evil of that Day, and shall cause them to meet brightness and joy.

verses.content: وَجَزَاهُم بِمَا صَبَرُوا جَنَّةً وَحَرِيرًا
verses.translation: And shall recompense them for that which they patiently bare with a Garden and silken garment.

verses.content: مُّتَّكِئِينَ فِيهَا عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ ۖ لَا يَرَوْنَ فِيهَا شَمْسًا وَلَا زَمْهَرِيرًا
verses.translation: Reclining therein upon couches, they shall behold therein neither sun nor hurting cold.

verses.content: وَدَانِيَةً عَلَيْهِمْ ظِلَالُهَا وَذُلِّلَتْ قُطُوفُهَا تَذْلِيلًا
verses.translation: And close upon them will be the shades thereof, and low will hang the clusters thereof greatly.

verses.content: وَيُطَافُ عَلَيْهِم بِآنِيَةٍ مِّن فِضَّةٍ وَأَكْوَابٍ كَانَتْ قَوَارِيرَا
verses.translation: And brought round amongst them will be vessels of silver and also goblets of glass.

verses.content: قَوَارِيرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ قَدَّرُوهَا تَقْدِيرًا
verses.translation: Godblets of silver, they shall have filled them to exact measure.

verses.content: وَيُسْقَوْنَ فِيهَا كَأْسًا كَانَ مِزَاجُهَا زَنجَبِيلًا
verses.translation: And therein they shall be given to drink of a cup whereof the admixture will be ginger.

verses.content: عَيْنًا فِيهَا تُسَمَّىٰ سَلْسَبِيلًا
verses.translation: From a fountain therein, named Salsabil.

verses.content: وَيَطُوفُ عَلَيْهِمْ وِلْدَانٌ مُّخَلَّدُونَ إِذَا رَأَيْتَهُمْ حَسِبْتَهُمْ لُؤْلُؤًا مَّنثُورًا
verses.translation: And there shall go round Unto them youths ever-young. When thou seest them thou wouldst deem them pearls unstrung.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَيْتَ ثَمَّ رَأَيْتَ نَعِيمًا وَمُلْكًا كَبِيرًا
verses.translation: And when thou lookest them thou shalt behold delight and a dominion magnificent.

verses.content: عَالِيَهُمْ ثِيَابُ سُندُسٍ خُضْرٌ وَإِسْتَبْرَقٌ ۖ وَحُلُّوا أَسَاوِرَ مِن فِضَّةٍ وَسَقَاهُمْ رَبُّهُمْ شَرَابًا طَهُورًا
verses.translation: Upon them shall be garments of fine green silk and of brocades. And adorned they shall be with bracelets of silver: and their Lord shall give them drink a beverage pure.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا كَانَ لَكُمْ جَزَاءً وَكَانَ سَعْيُكُم مَّشْكُورًا
verses.translation: Verily this is for you by way of recompense, and your endeavour hath been accepted.

verses.content: إِنَّا نَحْنُ نَزَّلْنَا عَلَيْكَ الْقُرْآنَ تَنزِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily We! it is We Who have revealed Unto thee the Qur'an, a gradual revelation.

verses.content: فَاصْبِرْ لِحُكْمِ رَبِّكَ وَلَا تُطِعْ مِنْهُمْ آثِمًا أَوْ كَفُورًا
verses.translation: Wherefore persevere thou with the commandment of thy Lord, and obey not thou of them, any sinner or ingrate.

verses.content: وَاذْكُرِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ بُكْرَةً وَأَصِيلًا
verses.translation: And remember thou the name of thy Lord in the morning and in the evening.

verses.content: وَمِنَ اللَّيْلِ فَاسْجُدْ لَهُ وَسَبِّحْهُ لَيْلًا طَوِيلًا
verses.translation: And during the night - worship Him; and hallow Him the livelong night.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ يُحِبُّونَ الْعَاجِلَةَ وَيَذَرُونَ وَرَاءَهُمْ يَوْمًا ثَقِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily those love the Herein, and leave in front of them a heavy day.

verses.content: نَّحْنُ خَلَقْنَاهُمْ وَشَدَدْنَا أَسْرَهُمْ ۖ وَإِذَا شِئْنَا بَدَّلْنَا أَمْثَالَهُمْ تَبْدِيلًا
verses.translation: It it We Who creared them and made them firm of make. And whenever We list, We can replace them with others like Unto them.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذِهِ تَذْكِرَةٌ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ سَبِيلًا
verses.translation: Verily this is an admonition; then whosoever Will, may choose a way Unto his Lord.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّ اللَّهَ كَانَ عَلِيمًا حَكِيمًا
verses.translation: And ye will not, unless Allah willeth. Verily Allah is ever Knowing, Wise.'

verses.content: يُدْخِلُ مَن يَشَاءُ فِي رَحْمَتِهِ ۚ وَالظَّالِمِينَ أَعَدَّ لَهُمْ عَذَابًا أَلِيمًا
verses.translation: He maketh whomsoever He listeth to enter His mercy. And the wrong-doers! for them He hath gotten ready a torment afflective.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْمُرْسَلَاتِ عُرْفًا
verses.translation: By the winds sent forth with beneficence.

verses.content: فَالْعَاصِفَاتِ عَصْفًا
verses.translation: And those raging swiftly;

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِرَاتِ نَشْرًا
verses.translation: By the spreading winds spreading.

verses.content: فَالْفَارِقَاتِ فَرْقًا
verses.translation: And the scattering wind scattering.

verses.content: فَالْمُلْقِيَاتِ ذِكْرًا
verses.translation: And those winds that bring down the remembrance.

verses.content: عُذْرًا أَوْ نُذْرًا
verses.translation: By way of excuse or warning.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا تُوعَدُونَ لَوَاقِعٌ
verses.translation: Verily that which ye are promised is about to befall.

verses.content: فَإِذَا النُّجُومُ طُمِسَتْ
verses.translation: So when stars are effaced.

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ فُرِجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven is cloven asunder.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ نُسِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains are carried away by wind.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الرُّسُلُ أُقِّتَتْ
verses.translation: And when the apostles are collected at the appointed time,

verses.content: لِأَيِّ يَوْمٍ أُجِّلَتْ
verses.translation: For what day is it timed?

verses.content: لِيَوْمِ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: For the Day of Decision.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ
verses.translation: And what knowest thou what the Day of Decision is?

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers

verses.content: أَلَمْ نُهْلِكِ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: Destroyed We not the ancients?

verses.content: ثُمَّ نُتْبِعُهُمُ الْآخِرِينَ
verses.translation: Thereafter We shall cause to follow them the latter ones.

verses.content: كَذَٰلِكَ نَفْعَلُ بِالْمُجْرِمِينَ
verses.translation: In this wise We do with the culprits.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَخْلُقكُّم مِّن مَّاءٍ مَّهِينٍ
verses.translation: Created We you not of water despicable,

verses.content: فَجَعَلْنَاهُ فِي قَرَارٍ مَّكِينٍ
verses.translation: Which We placed in a depository safe.

verses.content: إِلَىٰ قَدَرٍ مَّعْلُومٍ
verses.translation: Till a limit known?

verses.content: فَقَدَرْنَا فَنِعْمَ الْقَادِرُونَ
verses.translation: So We decreed. How excellent are We as decreers!

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ كِفَاتًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth a receptacle.

verses.content: أَحْيَاءً وَأَمْوَاتًا
verses.translation: Both for the living and the dead,

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا فِيهَا رَوَاسِيَ شَامِخَاتٍ وَأَسْقَيْنَاكُم مَّاءً فُرَاتًا
verses.translation: And have placed therein firm and tall mountains and given you to drink of water fresh

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ مَا كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: 'Depart Unto that which ye were wont to belie.

verses.content: انطَلِقُوا إِلَىٰ ظِلٍّ ذِي ثَلَاثِ شُعَبٍ
verses.translation: Depart Unto the shadow three branched:

verses.content: لَّا ظَلِيلٍ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِنَ اللَّهَبِ
verses.translation: Neither shading nor availing against the flame.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا تَرْمِي بِشَرَرٍ كَالْقَصْرِ
verses.translation: Verily it shall cast forth sparks like Unto a castle.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُ جِمَالَتٌ صُفْرٌ
verses.translation: As though they were camels yellow tawny.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ لَا يَنطِقُونَ
verses.translation: This is a Day whereon they shall not be able to speak.

verses.content: وَلَا يُؤْذَنُ لَهُمْ فَيَعْتَذِرُونَ
verses.translation: Nor shall they be permitted so that they might excuse themselves.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: هَـٰذَا يَوْمُ الْفَصْلِ ۖ جَمَعْنَاكُمْ وَالْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: This is the Day of Decision, We have assembled both ye and the ancients.

verses.content: فَإِن كَانَ لَكُمْ كَيْدٌ فَكِيدُونِ
verses.translation: If now ye have any craft, try that craft upon Me.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on the day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: إِنَّ الْمُتَّقِينَ فِي ظِلَالٍ وَعُيُونٍ
verses.translation: Verily the God-fearing shall be amid shades and springs,

verses.content: وَفَوَاكِهَ مِمَّا يَشْتَهُونَ
verses.translation: And fruits such as they shall desire.

verses.content: كُلُوا وَاشْرَبُوا هَنِيئًا بِمَا كُنتُمْ تَعْمَلُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and drink with relish that which ye have been working.

verses.content: إِنَّا كَذَٰلِكَ نَجْزِي الْمُحْسِنِينَ
verses.translation: Verily We! in this wise We recompense the well-doers.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: كُلُوا وَتَمَتَّعُوا قَلِيلًا إِنَّكُم مُّجْرِمُونَ
verses.translation: 'Eat and enjoy a little; verily ye are culprits.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: وَإِذَا قِيلَ لَهُمُ ارْكَعُوا لَا يَرْكَعُونَ
verses.translation: And when it is said Unto them: 'bow down, they bow not down.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that day Unto the beliers!

verses.content: فَبِأَيِّ حَدِيثٍ بَعْدَهُ يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: In what discourse, then, after it, will they believe?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَمَّ يَتَسَاءَلُونَ
verses.translation: Of what ask they?

verses.content: عَنِ النَّبَإِ الْعَظِيمِ
verses.translation: Of the mighty Announcement,

verses.content: الَّذِي هُمْ فِيهِ مُخْتَلِفُونَ
verses.translation: Concerning which they differ.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: By no means! anon they shall know.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَيَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again, by no means! anon they shall know.

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَلِ الْأَرْضَ مِهَادًا
verses.translation: Have We not made the earth an expanse.

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَوْتَادًا
verses.translation: And the mountains as stakes?

verses.content: وَخَلَقْنَاكُمْ أَزْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And We have created you in pairs.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا نَوْمَكُمْ سُبَاتًا
verses.translation: And We have made your sleep as a rest.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا اللَّيْلَ لِبَاسًا
verses.translation: And We have made the night a covering.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا النَّهَارَ مَعَاشًا
verses.translation: And We have made the day for seeking livelihood.

verses.content: وَبَنَيْنَا فَوْقَكُمْ سَبْعًا شِدَادًا
verses.translation: And We have builded over you seven strong heavens.

verses.content: وَجَعَلْنَا سِرَاجًا وَهَّاجًا
verses.translation: And We have set therein lamps glowing.

verses.content: وَأَنزَلْنَا مِنَ الْمُعْصِرَاتِ مَاءً ثَجَّاجًا
verses.translation: And We have sent down from the rain-clouds water plenteous.

verses.content: لِّنُخْرِجَ بِهِ حَبًّا وَنَبَاتًا
verses.translation: So that We bring forth thereby corn and vegetation.

verses.content: وَجَنَّاتٍ أَلْفَافًا
verses.translation: And gardens thick with trees.

verses.content: إِنَّ يَوْمَ الْفَصْلِ كَانَ مِيقَاتًا
verses.translation: Verily the Day of Decision is a time appointed.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يُنفَخُ فِي الصُّورِ فَتَأْتُونَ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: It is a Day whereon the trumpet will be blown, and ye will come in multitudes.

verses.content: وَفُتِحَتِ السَّمَاءُ فَكَانَتْ أَبْوَابًا
verses.translation: And the heaven will have been opened, and it will have become doors.

verses.content: وَسُيِّرَتِ الْجِبَالُ فَكَانَتْ سَرَابًا
verses.translation: And the mountains will have been removed away, and they will have become as mirage.

verses.content: إِنَّ جَهَنَّمَ كَانَتْ مِرْصَادًا
verses.translation: Verily the Hell is an ambuscade:

verses.content: لِّلطَّاغِينَ مَآبًا
verses.translation: For the exorbitant a receptacle.

verses.content: لَّابِثِينَ فِيهَا أَحْقَابًا
verses.translation: They will tarry therein for ages.

verses.content: لَّا يَذُوقُونَ فِيهَا بَرْدًا وَلَا شَرَابًا
verses.translation: They will not taste therein cool or any drink.

verses.content: إِلَّا حَمِيمًا وَغَسَّاقًا
verses.translation: Save scalding water and corruption.

verses.content: جَزَاءً وِفَاقًا
verses.translation: Recompense fitted!

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ كَانُوا لَا يَرْجُونَ حِسَابًا
verses.translation: Verily they were wont not to look for a reckoning.

verses.content: وَكَذَّبُوا بِآيَاتِنَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: And they belied Our revelations with strong belying.

verses.content: وَكُلَّ شَيْءٍ أَحْصَيْنَاهُ كِتَابًا
verses.translation: And everything We have recorded in a book.

verses.content: فَذُوقُوا فَلَن نَّزِيدَكُمْ إِلَّا عَذَابًا
verses.translation: Taste therefore. We shall not increase you in aught but torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ لِلْمُتَّقِينَ مَفَازًا
verses.translation: Verily for the God-fearing is an achievement.

verses.content: حَدَائِقَ وَأَعْنَابًا
verses.translation: Gardens enclosed and vineyards,

verses.content: وَكَوَاعِبَ أَتْرَابًا
verses.translation: And full-breasted maidens of equal age.

verses.content: وَكَأْسًا دِهَاقًا
verses.translation: And a cup overflowing.

verses.content: لَّا يَسْمَعُونَ فِيهَا لَغْوًا وَلَا كِذَّابًا
verses.translation: They will hear therein no babble nor falsehood:

verses.content: جَزَاءً مِّن رَّبِّكَ عَطَاءً حِسَابًا
verses.translation: A recompense from thy Lord-a gift sufficient -

verses.content: رَّبِّ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا بَيْنَهُمَا الرَّحْمَـٰنِ ۖ لَا يَمْلِكُونَ مِنْهُ خِطَابًا
verses.translation: From the Lord of the heavens and the earth and of whatsoever is in bet-ween them, the Compassionate with Whom they can demand not audience.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ الرُّوحُ وَالْمَلَائِكَةُ صَفًّا ۖ لَّا يَتَكَلَّمُونَ إِلَّا مَنْ أَذِنَ لَهُ الرَّحْمَـٰنُ وَقَالَ صَوَابًا
verses.translation: On the Day whereon the spirits and the angels will stand arrayed, they will not be able to speak save him whom the Compassionate giveth leave and who speaketh aright.

verses.content: ذَٰلِكَ الْيَوْمُ الْحَقُّ ۖ فَمَن شَاءَ اتَّخَذَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّهِ مَآبًا
verses.translation: That is the Sure Day. Whosoever therefore willeth, let him betake Unto his Lord a resort.

verses.content: إِنَّا أَنذَرْنَاكُمْ عَذَابًا قَرِيبًا يَوْمَ يَنظُرُ الْمَرْءُ مَا قَدَّمَتْ يَدَاهُ وَيَقُولُ الْكَافِرُ يَا لَيْتَنِي كُنتُ تُرَابًا
verses.translation: Verily We! We have warned you of a torment nigh at hand, a Day whereon a man shall behold that which his hands have sent forth, and the infidel will say: would that I were dust!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالنَّازِعَاتِ غَرْقًا
verses.translation: By the angels who drag forth vehemently.

verses.content: وَالنَّاشِطَاتِ نَشْطًا
verses.translation: By the angels who release with gentle release.

verses.content: وَالسَّابِحَاتِ سَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the angels who glide swimmingiy,

verses.content: فَالسَّابِقَاتِ سَبْقًا
verses.translation: And then they speed with foremost speed.

verses.content: فَالْمُدَبِّرَاتِ أَمْرًا
verses.translation: And then they manage the affair,

verses.content: يَوْمَ تَرْجُفُ الرَّاجِفَةُ
verses.translation: A Day shall come whereon the quaking will quake,

verses.content: تَتْبَعُهَا الرَّادِفَةُ
verses.translation: And there will follow it the next blast.

verses.content: قُلُوبٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ وَاجِفَةٌ
verses.translation: Hearts on that Day will be throbbing;

verses.content: أَبْصَارُهَا خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Their looks will be downcast.

verses.content: يَقُولُونَ أَإِنَّا لَمَرْدُودُونَ فِي الْحَافِرَةِ
verses.translation: They say: shall we indeed be restored to the first state,

verses.content: أَإِذَا كُنَّا عِظَامًا نَّخِرَةً
verses.translation: When we have become bones decayed!

verses.content: قَالُوا تِلْكَ إِذًا كَرَّةٌ خَاسِرَةٌ
verses.translation: They say: that then shall be a losing return.

verses.content: فَإِنَّمَا هِيَ زَجْرَةٌ وَاحِدَةٌ
verses.translation: It will be only one scaring shout,

verses.content: فَإِذَا هُم بِالسَّاهِرَةِ
verses.translation: And lo! they all shall appear on the surface.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ مُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Hath there come Unto thee the story of Musa!

verses.content: إِذْ نَادَاهُ رَبُّهُ بِالْوَادِ الْمُقَدَّسِ طُوًى
verses.translation: Recall what time his Lord called Unto him in the holy vale of Tuwa.

verses.content: اذْهَبْ إِلَىٰ فِرْعَوْنَ إِنَّهُ طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Saying:'go thou Unto Fir'awn; verily he hath waxen exorbitant.

verses.content: فَقُلْ هَل لَّكَ إِلَىٰ أَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Then say thou: 'wouldst thou to be purified?

verses.content: وَأَهْدِيَكَ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَتَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Then shall guide thee Unto thy Lord so that thou shalt fear.

verses.content: فَأَرَاهُ الْآيَةَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he shewed him the great sign.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبَ وَعَصَىٰ
verses.translation: Yet he belied and disobeyed.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَدْبَرَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he turned back striving.

verses.content: فَحَشَرَ فَنَادَىٰ
verses.translation: Then he gathered and cried aloud,

verses.content: فَقَالَ أَنَا رَبُّكُمُ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: And he said: I am Your Lord, most high.

verses.content: فَأَخَذَهُ اللَّهُ نَكَالَ الْآخِرَةِ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Wherefore Allah laid hold of him with the punishment of the Hereafter and of the present.

verses.content: إِنَّ فِي ذَٰلِكَ لَعِبْرَةً لِّمَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily herein is lesson for him who feareth.

verses.content: أَأَنتُمْ أَشَدُّ خَلْقًا أَمِ السَّمَاءُ ۚ بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: Are ye harder to create or the heaven which He hath builded?

verses.content: رَفَعَ سَمْكَهَا فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: He hath raised the height thereof and perfected it.

verses.content: وَأَغْطَشَ لَيْلَهَا وَأَخْرَجَ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: And He made dark its night, and brought forth its sunshine.

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضَ بَعْدَ ذَٰلِكَ دَحَاهَا
verses.translation: And the earth!- thereafter He stretched it out.

verses.content: أَخْرَجَ مِنْهَا مَاءَهَا وَمَرْعَاهَا
verses.translation: And he brought forth therefrom its water, and its pasture.

verses.content: وَالْجِبَالَ أَرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: And the mountains! - He established them firm:

verses.content: مَتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: A provision for you and your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الطَّامَّةُ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Then when the Grand Calamity shall come

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ مَا سَعَىٰ
verses.translation: The Day whereon man shall rember whatsoever he had striven for.

verses.content: وَبُرِّزَتِ الْجَحِيمُ لِمَن يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Scorch will be made apparent to any one who beholdeth.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن طَغَىٰ
verses.translation: Then as for him who waxed exorbitant,

verses.content: وَآثَرَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: And who chose the life of the world,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَحِيمَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily the Scorch! that shall be his resort.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَافَ مَقَامَ رَبِّهِ وَنَهَى النَّفْسَ عَنِ الْهَوَىٰ
verses.translation: And as for him who dreaded standing before his Lord, and restrained his soul from lust,

verses.content: فَإِنَّ الْجَنَّةَ هِيَ الْمَأْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily the Garden! -that shall be his resort.

verses.content: يَسْأَلُونَكَ عَنِ السَّاعَةِ أَيَّانَ مُرْسَاهَا
verses.translation: They question thee of the Hour:'when will its arrival be?

verses.content: فِيمَ أَنتَ مِن ذِكْرَاهَا
verses.translation: Wherein art thou concerred with the declaration thereof!

verses.content: إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ مُنتَهَاهَا
verses.translation: Unto thy Lord is the Knowledge of the limit fixed therefor.

verses.content: إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُنذِرُ مَن يَخْشَاهَا
verses.translation: Thou art but a warner Unto him who feareth.

verses.content: كَأَنَّهُمْ يَوْمَ يَرَوْنَهَا لَمْ يَلْبَثُوا إِلَّا عَشِيَّةً أَوْ ضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: On the Day whereon they behold it, it will appear to them as though they had not tarried save an evening or the morn thereof.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ عَبَسَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: He frowned and turned away.

verses.content: أَن جَاءَهُ الْأَعْمَىٰ
verses.translation: Because there came Unto him a blind man.

verses.content: وَمَا يُدْرِيكَ لَعَلَّهُ يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: How canst thou know, whether haply he might be cleansed,

verses.content: أَوْ يَذَّكَّرُ فَتَنفَعَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Or be admonished, so that the admonition might have profited him?

verses.content: أَمَّا مَنِ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As for him who regardeth himself self-sufficient-

verses.content: فَأَنتَ لَهُ تَصَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: Unto him thou attendest.

verses.content: وَمَا عَلَيْكَ أَلَّا يَزَّكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Whereas it is not on thee that he is not cleansed.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن جَاءَكَ يَسْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And as for him who cometh Unto thee running,

verses.content: وَهُوَ يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: And he feareth'-

verses.content: فَأَنتَ عَنْهُ تَلَهَّىٰ
verses.translation: Him thou neglectest!

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهَا تَذْكِرَةٌ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily it is an admonition.

verses.content: فَمَن شَاءَ ذَكَرَهُ
verses.translation: So whosoever willeth-let him be admonished therewlth.

verses.content: فِي صُحُفٍ مُّكَرَّمَةٍ
verses.translation: Inscribed in Writs honoured,"

verses.content: مَّرْفُوعَةٍ مُّطَهَّرَةٍ
verses.translation: Exalted, Purified,

verses.content: بِأَيْدِي سَفَرَةٍ
verses.translation: By the hands of scribes.

verses.content: كِرَامٍ بَرَرَةٍ
verses.translation: Honourable and virtuous.

verses.content: قُتِلَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا أَكْفَرَهُ
verses.translation: Perish man! how ungrateful he is!

verses.content: مِنْ أَيِّ شَيْءٍ خَلَقَهُ
verses.translation: Of what thing hath He created him?

verses.content: مِن نُّطْفَةٍ خَلَقَهُ فَقَدَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Of a drop of seed. He created him and formed him according to a measure.

verses.content: ثُمَّ السَّبِيلَ يَسَّرَهُ
verses.translation: Then the way He made easy.

verses.content: ثُمَّ أَمَاتَهُ فَأَقْبَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then He caused him to die and made him to be buried.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِذَا شَاءَ أَنشَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then when He listeth, He shall raise him to life.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَمَّا يَقْضِ مَا أَمَرَهُ
verses.translation: By no means He performed not that which He had commanded him.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ إِلَىٰ طَعَامِهِ
verses.translation: Let man look at his food:

verses.content: أَنَّا صَبَبْنَا الْمَاءَ صَبًّا
verses.translation: It is We Who pour forth water, pouring,

verses.content: ثُمَّ شَقَقْنَا الْأَرْضَ شَقًّا
verses.translation: Thereafter We cleave the earth in clefts,

verses.content: فَأَنبَتْنَا فِيهَا حَبًّا
verses.translation: Then We cause therein the grain to grow,

verses.content: وَعِنَبًا وَقَضْبًا
verses.translation: And grapes and vegetables

verses.content: وَزَيْتُونًا وَنَخْلًا
verses.translation: And olives and palms

verses.content: وَحَدَائِقَ غُلْبًا
verses.translation: And enclosed gardens luxuriant.

verses.content: وَفَاكِهَةً وَأَبًّا
verses.translation: And fruits and herbage:

verses.content: مَّتَاعًا لَّكُمْ وَلِأَنْعَامِكُمْ
verses.translation: A provision for you and for your cattle.

verses.content: فَإِذَا جَاءَتِ الصَّاخَّةُ
verses.translation: Then when cometh the Deafening Cry-

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَفِرُّ الْمَرْءُ مِنْ أَخِيهِ
verses.translation: On the Day whereon a man shall flee from his brother,

verses.content: وَأُمِّهِ وَأَبِيهِ
verses.translation: And his mother and his father,

verses.content: وَصَاحِبَتِهِ وَبَنِيهِ
verses.translation: And his wife and his sons;

verses.content: لِكُلِّ امْرِئٍ مِّنْهُمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ شَأْنٌ يُغْنِيهِ
verses.translation: For every one of them on that Day shall be business enough to occupy

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ مُّسْفِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day shall be beaming,

verses.content: ضَاحِكَةٌ مُّسْتَبْشِرَةٌ
verses.translation: Laughing, rejoicing.

verses.content: وَوُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَلَيْهَا غَبَرَةٌ
verses.translation: And faces on that Day! upon them shall be gloom.

verses.content: تَرْهَقُهَا قَتَرَةٌ
verses.translation: Dust shall cover them

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمُ الْكَفَرَةُ الْفَجَرَةُ
verses.translation: Those! they are the infidels, the ungodly.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا الشَّمْسُ كُوِّرَتْ
verses.translation: When the sun shall be wound round,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّجُومُ انكَدَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars shall dart down,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجِبَالُ سُيِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the mountains shall be made to pass away,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْعِشَارُ عُطِّلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the she-camels big with young shall be abandoned,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْوُحُوشُ حُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the wild beasts shall be gathered together,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ سُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas shall be filled,

verses.content: وَإِذَا النُّفُوسُ زُوِّجَتْ
verses.translation: And when the souls he paired,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْمَوْءُودَةُ سُئِلَتْ
verses.translation: And when the girl buried alive shall be asked:

verses.content: بِأَيِّ ذَنبٍ قُتِلَتْ
verses.translation: For what sin she was slain.

verses.content: وَإِذَا الصُّحُفُ نُشِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Writs shall be lain open,

verses.content: وَإِذَا السَّمَاءُ كُشِطَتْ
verses.translation: And when the heaven shall be stripped,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَحِيمُ سُعِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Scorch shall be made to blaze,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْجَنَّةُ أُزْلِفَتْ
verses.translation: And when the Garden shall be brought nigh,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا أَحْضَرَتْ
verses.translation: Then every soul shall know that which it: hath presented.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالْخُنَّسِ
verses.translation: I swear by the receding stars.

verses.content: الْجَوَارِ الْكُنَّسِ
verses.translation: Moving swiftly and hiding themselves,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا عَسْعَسَ
verses.translation: And by the night when it departeth,

verses.content: وَالصُّبْحِ إِذَا تَنَفَّسَ
verses.translation: And by the morning when it shineth forth,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلُ رَسُولٍ كَرِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily it is a Word brought by a messenger honoured,

verses.content: ذِي قُوَّةٍ عِندَ ذِي الْعَرْشِ مَكِينٍ
verses.translation: Owner of strength, of established dignity with the Lord of the Throne.

verses.content: مُّطَاعٍ ثَمَّ أَمِينٍ
verses.translation: Obeyed one there; trustWorthy.

verses.content: وَمَا صَاحِبُكُم بِمَجْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Nor is your companion distracted.

verses.content: وَلَقَدْ رَآهُ بِالْأُفُقِ الْمُبِينِ
verses.translation: Assuredly he beheld him in the horizon manifest.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ عَلَى الْغَيْبِ بِضَنِينٍ
verses.translation: And he is of the unseen not a tenacious concealer.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِقَوْلِ شَيْطَانٍ رَّجِيمٍ
verses.translation: Nor is it the word of a Satan accursed.

verses.content: فَأَيْنَ تَذْهَبُونَ
verses.translation: Whither then go ye?

verses.content: إِنْ هُوَ إِلَّا ذِكْرٌ لِّلْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: This is naught but an Admonition Unto the worlds-

verses.content: لِمَن شَاءَ مِنكُمْ أَن يَسْتَقِيمَ
verses.translation: Unto whomsoever of you willeth to walk straight.

verses.content: وَمَا تَشَاءُونَ إِلَّا أَن يَشَاءَ اللَّهُ رَبُّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: And ye shall not will unless it be that Allah, the Lord of the worlds, willeth.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انفَطَرَتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven shall be cleft,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْكَوَاكِبُ انتَثَرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the stars shall be scattered,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْبِحَارُ فُجِّرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the seas are flowed out,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْقُبُورُ بُعْثِرَتْ
verses.translation: And when the graves are ransacked,

verses.content: عَلِمَتْ نَفْسٌ مَّا قَدَّمَتْ وَأَخَّرَتْ
verses.translation: Each soul shall know that which it sent afore and that which it left behind.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ مَا غَرَّكَ بِرَبِّكَ الْكَرِيمِ
verses.translation: O man! what hath beguiled thee concerning thy Lord, the Bountiful,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَكَ فَسَوَّاكَ فَعَدَلَكَ
verses.translation: Who created thee, then moulded thee, then proportioned thee?

verses.content: فِي أَيِّ صُورَةٍ مَّا شَاءَ رَكَّبَكَ
verses.translation: In whatsoever form He listed He constructed thee.

verses.content: كَلَّا بَلْ تُكَذِّبُونَ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: By no means! Aye, ye belie the the Requital.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ عَلَيْكُمْ لَحَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Verify there are for you guardians,

verses.content: كِرَامًا كَاتِبِينَ
verses.translation: Honourablel scribes.

verses.content: يَعْلَمُونَ مَا تَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: They know whatsoever ye do.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily the pious shall be in Delight.

verses.content: وَإِنَّ الْفُجَّارَ لَفِي جَحِيمٍ
verses.translation: And verily the ungodly shall be in a Scorch.

verses.content: يَصْلَوْنَهَا يَوْمَ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Roasted they shall be therein on the Day of Requital.

verses.content: وَمَا هُمْ عَنْهَا بِغَائِبِينَ
verses.translation: And thence they shall not be allowed to be absent.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee know whatsoever the Day of Requital is?

verses.content: ثُمَّ مَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا يَوْمُ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Again, what shall make thee know whatsoever the Day of Requital is?

verses.content: يَوْمَ لَا تَمْلِكُ نَفْسٌ لِّنَفْسٍ شَيْئًا ۖ وَالْأَمْرُ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلَّهِ
verses.translation: It is a Day whereon no soul shall own aught of power for any soul; and the command on that Day will be Allah's.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّلْمُطَفِّفِينَ
verses.translation: Woe Unto the scrimpers:

verses.content: الَّذِينَ إِذَا اكْتَالُوا عَلَى النَّاسِ يَسْتَوْفُونَ
verses.translation: Those who, when they take by measure from mankind, exact the full,

verses.content: وَإِذَا كَالُوهُمْ أَو وَّزَنُوهُمْ يُخْسِرُونَ
verses.translation: And who, when they measure Unto them or weigh for them, diminish.

verses.content: أَلَا يَظُنُّ أُولَـٰئِكَ أَنَّهُم مَّبْعُوثُونَ
verses.translation: Imagine such men not that they shall be raised up?

verses.content: لِيَوْمٍ عَظِيمٍ
verses.translation: On a mighty Day.

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَقُومُ النَّاسُ لِرَبِّ الْعَالَمِينَ
verses.translation: A Day whereon mankind shall stand before the Lord of the worlds?

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْفُجَّارِ لَفِي سِجِّينٍ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily the record of the ungodly is in Sijjin.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا سِجِّينٌ
verses.translation: And what will make thee know whatsoever the record in Sijjin is?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A record of misdeeds written.

verses.content: وَيْلٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ لِّلْمُكَذِّبِينَ
verses.translation: Woe on that Day unto the belviers-

verses.content: الَّذِينَ يُكَذِّبُونَ بِيَوْمِ الدِّينِ
verses.translation: Those who belie the Day of Requital.

verses.content: وَمَا يُكَذِّبُ بِهِ إِلَّا كُلُّ مُعْتَدٍ أَثِيمٍ
verses.translation: And none belieth it save each trespasser, sinner.

verses.content: إِذَا تُتْلَىٰ عَلَيْهِ آيَاتُنَا قَالَ أَسَاطِيرُ الْأَوَّلِينَ
verses.translation: And when Our revelations are rehearsed Unto him, she saith:'fables of the ancients!

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَلْ ۜ رَانَ عَلَىٰ قُلُوبِهِم مَّا كَانُوا يَكْسِبُونَ
verses.translation: By no means!' Aye! encrusted upon their hearts is that which they have been earning.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّهُمْ عَن رَّبِّهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّمَحْجُوبُونَ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily on that Day from their Lord they will be shut Out.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّهُمْ لَصَالُو الْجَحِيمِ
verses.translation: Then verily they will be roasted into the Scorch.

verses.content: ثُمَّ يُقَالُ هَـٰذَا الَّذِي كُنتُم بِهِ تُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Then it will be said: 'this is that which ye were wont to belie.'

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ كِتَابَ الْأَبْرَارِ لَفِي عِلِّيِّينَ
verses.translation: By no means! Verily the record of the virtuous shall be in 'Illiyun.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا عِلِّيُّونَ
verses.translation: And what will make thee know whatsoever the record in Illiyun is?

verses.content: كِتَابٌ مَّرْقُومٌ
verses.translation: A record of good deeds written.

verses.content: يَشْهَدُهُ الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: To which bear witness those brought nigh.

verses.content: إِنَّ الْأَبْرَارَ لَفِي نَعِيمٍ
verses.translation: Verily the virtuous shall be in Delight,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: Reclining on couches, looking on.

verses.content: تَعْرِفُ فِي وُجُوهِهِمْ نَضْرَةَ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Thou wilt recognize in their faces the brightness of delight.

verses.content: يُسْقَوْنَ مِن رَّحِيقٍ مَّخْتُومٍ
verses.translation: They will be given to drink of pure wine, sealed.

verses.content: خِتَامُهُ مِسْكٌ ۚ وَفِي ذَٰلِكَ فَلْيَتَنَافَسِ الْمُتَنَافِسُونَ
verses.translation: The seal thereof will be of musk and to this end let the aspirers aspire -

verses.content: وَمِزَاجُهُ مِن تَسْنِيمٍ
verses.translation: And admixture thereof will be Water of Tasnim:

verses.content: عَيْنًا يَشْرَبُ بِهَا الْمُقَرَّبُونَ
verses.translation: A fountain whereof will drink those brought nigh.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ أَجْرَمُوا كَانُوا مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Veriiy those who have sinned were wont at those who had believed to laugh,

verses.content: وَإِذَا مَرُّوا بِهِمْ يَتَغَامَزُونَ
verses.translation: And, when they passed them, to wink at each other,

verses.content: وَإِذَا انقَلَبُوا إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِمُ انقَلَبُوا فَكِهِينَ
verses.translation: And when they returned to their household they returned jesting.

verses.content: وَإِذَا رَأَوْهُمْ قَالُوا إِنَّ هَـٰؤُلَاءِ لَضَالُّونَ
verses.translation: And when they saw them, they said: verily these are the strayed ones.

verses.content: وَمَا أُرْسِلُوا عَلَيْهِمْ حَافِظِينَ
verses.translation: Whereas they were not sent over them as watchers.

verses.content: فَالْيَوْمَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا مِنَ الْكُفَّارِ يَضْحَكُونَ
verses.translation: Wherefore Today, those who believed at the infidels are laughing,

verses.content: عَلَى الْأَرَائِكِ يَنظُرُونَ
verses.translation: Reclining on couches, looking on.

verses.content: هَلْ ثُوِّبَ الْكُفَّارُ مَا كَانُوا يَفْعَلُونَ
verses.translation: The infidels have indeed been rewarded for that which they had been doing.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا السَّمَاءُ انشَقَّتْ
verses.translation: When the heaven is sundered.

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And it hearkeneth to its Lord, and is duteous,

verses.content: وَإِذَا الْأَرْضُ مُدَّتْ
verses.translation: And when the earth shall be stretched forth.

verses.content: وَأَلْقَتْ مَا فِيهَا وَتَخَلَّتْ
verses.translation: And shall cast forth that which is therein, and shall become empty.

verses.content: وَأَذِنَتْ لِرَبِّهَا وَحُقَّتْ
verses.translation: And it hearkeneth to its Lord, and is duteous.

verses.content: يَا أَيُّهَا الْإِنسَانُ إِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلَاقِيهِ
verses.translation: O man! verily thou art toiling toward thy Lord a painful toiling, and art about to meet Him.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ بِيَمِينِهِ
verses.translation: Then as to him who shall be given his book in his right hand -

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يُحَاسَبُ حِسَابًا يَسِيرًا
verses.translation: His account shall presently be taken by an easy reckoning.

verses.content: وَيَنقَلِبُ إِلَىٰ أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: And he shall return Unto his people joyfully.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ أُوتِيَ كِتَابَهُ وَرَاءَ ظَهْرِهِ
verses.translation: And as to him who shall be given his book from behind his back-

verses.content: فَسَوْفَ يَدْعُو ثُبُورًا
verses.translation: He shall presently call for death,

verses.content: وَيَصْلَىٰ سَعِيرًا
verses.translation: And he shall roast into a Blaze.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ كَانَ فِي أَهْلِهِ مَسْرُورًا
verses.translation: Verily he was among his people joyous.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ ظَنَّ أَن لَّن يَحُورَ
verses.translation: Verily he imagined that he would not be back.

verses.content: بَلَىٰ إِنَّ رَبَّهُ كَانَ بِهِ بَصِيرًا
verses.translation: Yea! his Lord had ever been beholding him.

verses.content: فَلَا أُقْسِمُ بِالشَّفَقِ
verses.translation: I swear by the afterglow of sunset,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ وَمَا وَسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the night and that which it driveth together,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا اتَّسَقَ
verses.translation: And by the moon when she becometh full.

verses.content: لَتَرْكَبُنَّ طَبَقًا عَن طَبَقٍ
verses.translation: Surely ye shall ride layer upon layer.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُمْ لَا يُؤْمِنُونَ
verses.translation: What aileth them then, that they believe not,

verses.content: وَإِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْآنُ لَا يَسْجُدُونَ ۩
verses.translation: And that, when the Qur'an is read Unto them, they prostrate not them-selves!

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا يُكَذِّبُونَ
verses.translation: Yea those who disbelieve belie.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ أَعْلَمُ بِمَا يُوعُونَ
verses.translation: Whereas Allah knoweth best that which they cherish.

verses.content: فَبَشِّرْهُم بِعَذَابٍ أَلِيمٍ
verses.translation: Wherefore announce thou Unto them a torment afflictive.

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: But those who believe and work righteous works, theirs shall be a hire unending.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الْبُرُوجِ
verses.translation: By the heaven adorned with big stars.

verses.content: وَالْيَوْمِ الْمَوْعُودِ
verses.translation: And by the Day promised,

verses.content: وَشَاهِدٍ وَمَشْهُودٍ
verses.translation: And by the Day witnessing and the Day witnessed,

verses.content: قُتِلَ أَصْحَابُ الْأُخْدُودِ
verses.translation: Perish the fellows of the ditch,

verses.content: النَّارِ ذَاتِ الْوَقُودِ
verses.translation: Of fire fuel-fed,

verses.content: إِذْ هُمْ عَلَيْهَا قُعُودٌ
verses.translation: When they sat by it

verses.content: وَهُمْ عَلَىٰ مَا يَفْعَلُونَ بِالْمُؤْمِنِينَ شُهُودٌ
verses.translation: And to that which they did to the believers were witnesses.

verses.content: وَمَا نَقَمُوا مِنْهُمْ إِلَّا أَن يُؤْمِنُوا بِاللَّهِ الْعَزِيزِ الْحَمِيدِ
verses.translation: And they persecuted them for naught save that they believed in Allah, the Mighty, the Praiseworthy

verses.content: الَّذِي لَهُ مُلْكُ السَّمَاوَاتِ وَالْأَرْضِ ۚ وَاللَّهُ عَلَىٰ كُلِّ شَيْءٍ شَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: Him, Whose is the dominion of heavens and the earth. And Allah is over everything a Witness.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ فَتَنُوا الْمُؤْمِنِينَ وَالْمُؤْمِنَاتِ ثُمَّ لَمْ يَتُوبُوا فَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ جَهَنَّمَ وَلَهُمْ عَذَابُ الْحَرِيقِ
verses.translation: Verily those who affected the believing men and the believing women, and then repented not, theirs shall be the torment of Hell, and theirs shall be the torment of burning.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ لَهُمْ جَنَّاتٌ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ الْفَوْزُ الْكَبِيرُ
verses.translation: Verily those who believed and worked righteons works, theirs shall be Gardens whereunder the rivers flow; that is the supreme achievement.

verses.content: إِنَّ بَطْشَ رَبِّكَ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: Verily the grip of thine Lord is severe.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ هُوَ يُبْدِئُ وَيُعِيدُ
verses.translation: Verily He! He it is who beginneth and repeateth it.

verses.content: وَهُوَ الْغَفُورُ الْوَدُودُ
verses.translation: And He is the Fogiving, the Loving,

verses.content: ذُو الْعَرْشِ الْمَجِيدُ
verses.translation: Lord of the Throne, the Glorious,

verses.content: فَعَّالٌ لِّمَا يُرِيدُ
verses.translation: Doer of whatsoever He intendeth.

verses.content: هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْجُنُودِ
verses.translation: Hath there come Unto thee the story of the hosts-

verses.content: فِرْعَوْنَ وَثَمُودَ
verses.translation: Of the Fir'awn and the Thamud?

verses.content: بَلِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا فِي تَكْذِيبٍ
verses.translation: But those who disbelieve are engaged in denial.

verses.content: وَاللَّهُ مِن وَرَائِهِم مُّحِيطٌ
verses.translation: Whereas Allah is, from behind them, Encompassing.

verses.content: بَلْ هُوَ قُرْآنٌ مَّجِيدٌ
verses.translation: Aye! it is a Recitation glorious,

verses.content: فِي لَوْحٍ مَّحْفُوظٍ
verses.translation: Inscribed in a tablet preserved.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالسَّمَاءِ وَالطَّارِقِ
verses.translation: By the heaven and the night-comer

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الطَّارِقُ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee know that which the night-comer is?-

verses.content: النَّجْمُ الثَّاقِبُ
verses.translation: It is the star shing brightly.

verses.content: إِن كُلُّ نَفْسٍ لَّمَّا عَلَيْهَا حَافِظٌ
verses.translation: No soul is there but hath over it a watcher.

verses.content: فَلْيَنظُرِ الْإِنسَانُ مِمَّ خُلِقَ
verses.translation: So let man look - from what is he created.

verses.content: خُلِقَ مِن مَّاءٍ دَافِقٍ
verses.translation: He is created from a water drip-ping,

verses.content: يَخْرُجُ مِن بَيْنِ الصُّلْبِ وَالتَّرَائِبِ
verses.translation: That issueth from between the loins and the breast-bones.

verses.content: إِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ رَجْعِهِ لَقَادِرٌ
verses.translation: Verily He is Able to restore him,

verses.content: يَوْمَ تُبْلَى السَّرَائِرُ
verses.translation: On a Day whereon secrets shall be out.

verses.content: فَمَا لَهُ مِن قُوَّةٍ وَلَا نَاصِرٍ
verses.translation: Then he shall have no power nor any helper.

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ ذَاتِ الرَّجْعِ
verses.translation: By the heaven which returneth,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ ذَاتِ الصَّدْعِ
verses.translation: And by the earth which splitteth,

verses.content: إِنَّهُ لَقَوْلٌ فَصْلٌ
verses.translation: Verily, it is a discourse distinguishing.

verses.content: وَمَا هُوَ بِالْهَزْلِ
verses.translation: And it is not a frivolity.

verses.content: إِنَّهُمْ يَكِيدُونَ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: Verily they are plotting a plot.

verses.content: وَأَكِيدُ كَيْدًا
verses.translation: And I am plotting a plot.

verses.content: فَمَهِّلِ الْكَافِرِينَ أَمْهِلْهُمْ رُوَيْدًا
verses.translation: So respite thou the infidels - respite them gently,

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ سَبِّحِ اسْمَ رَبِّكَ الْأَعْلَى
verses.translation: Hallow thou the name of thine Lord, the Most High,

verses.content: الَّذِي خَلَقَ فَسَوَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who hath created and then proportioned,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي قَدَّرَ فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And Who hath disposed and then guided,

verses.content: وَالَّذِي أَخْرَجَ الْمَرْعَىٰ
verses.translation: And Who bringeth forth the pasturage,

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُ غُثَاءً أَحْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Then maketh it to stubble dusky.

verses.content: سَنُقْرِئُكَ فَلَا تَنسَىٰ
verses.translation: We shall enable thee to recite, and then thou shalt not forget,

verses.content: إِلَّا مَا شَاءَ اللَّهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ يَعْلَمُ الْجَهْرَ وَمَا يَخْفَىٰ
verses.translation: Save that which Allah may will. Verily He knoweth the public and that which is hidden.

verses.content: وَنُيَسِّرُكَ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And We shall make easy Unto thee the easy way.

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِن نَّفَعَتِ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Wherefore admonish thou; admonition hath surely profited,

verses.content: سَيَذَّكَّرُ مَن يَخْشَىٰ
verses.translation: Admonished is he indeed who feareth,

verses.content: وَيَتَجَنَّبُهَا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: And the wretched shunneth it-.

verses.content: الَّذِي يَصْلَى النَّارَ الْكُبْرَىٰ
verses.translation: He Who shall roast into the Great Fire,

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَا يَمُوتُ فِيهَا وَلَا يَحْيَىٰ
verses.translation: Wherein he shall neither die nor live,

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن تَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: He indeed hath attained bliss who hath cleansed himself,

verses.content: وَذَكَرَ اسْمَ رَبِّهِ فَصَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: And who remembereth the name of his Lord, and then prayeth.

verses.content: بَلْ تُؤْثِرُونَ الْحَيَاةَ الدُّنْيَا
verses.translation: But ye prefer the life of this world,

verses.content: وَالْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ وَأَبْقَىٰ
verses.translation: Whereas the Hereafter is better and more lasting.

verses.content: إِنَّ هَـٰذَا لَفِي الصُّحُفِ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily this is in Writs ancient

verses.content: صُحُفِ إِبْرَاهِيمَ وَمُوسَىٰ
verses.translation: Writs of Ibrahim and Musa.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ هَلْ أَتَاكَ حَدِيثُ الْغَاشِيَةِ
verses.translation: Hath there come Unto thee the story of the Enveloping Event?

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ خَاشِعَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day shall be downcast,

verses.content: عَامِلَةٌ نَّاصِبَةٌ
verses.translation: Travailing, worn.

verses.content: تَصْلَىٰ نَارًا حَامِيَةً
verses.translation: They shall roast into the scalding Fire,

verses.content: تُسْقَىٰ مِنْ عَيْنٍ آنِيَةٍ
verses.translation: Given to drink of a spring fiercely boiling.

verses.content: لَّيْسَ لَهُمْ طَعَامٌ إِلَّا مِن ضَرِيعٍ
verses.translation: No food shall be theirs save bitter thorn,

verses.content: لَّا يُسْمِنُ وَلَا يُغْنِي مِن جُوعٍ
verses.translation: Which shall neither nourish nor avail against hunger.

verses.content: وُجُوهٌ يَوْمَئِذٍ نَّاعِمَةٌ
verses.translation: Faces on that Day shall be de lighted,

verses.content: لِّسَعْيِهَا رَاضِيَةٌ
verses.translation: With their endeavour well pleased.

verses.content: فِي جَنَّةٍ عَالِيَةٍ
verses.translation: They shall be in a Garden lofty:

verses.content: لَّا تَسْمَعُ فِيهَا لَاغِيَةً
verses.translation: They shall hear therein no vain discourse;

verses.content: فِيهَا عَيْنٌ جَارِيَةٌ
verses.translation: Therein shall be a spring running!

verses.content: فِيهَا سُرُرٌ مَّرْفُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: Therein shall be couches elevated!

verses.content: وَأَكْوَابٌ مَّوْضُوعَةٌ
verses.translation: And goblets ready placed!

verses.content: وَنَمَارِقُ مَصْفُوفَةٌ
verses.translation: And cushions ranged!

verses.content: وَزَرَابِيُّ مَبْثُوثَةٌ
verses.translation: And carpets ready spread,

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَنظُرُونَ إِلَى الْإِبِلِ كَيْفَ خُلِقَتْ
verses.translation: Look they not at the camels, how they are created?

verses.content: وَإِلَى السَّمَاءِ كَيْفَ رُفِعَتْ
verses.translation: And at the heaven, how it is raised?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْجِبَالِ كَيْفَ نُصِبَتْ
verses.translation: And at the mountains, how they are rooted?

verses.content: وَإِلَى الْأَرْضِ كَيْفَ سُطِحَتْ
verses.translation: And at the earth, how it is outspread?

verses.content: فَذَكِّرْ إِنَّمَا أَنتَ مُذَكِّرٌ
verses.translation: Admonish thou then; thou art but an admonisher.

verses.content: لَّسْتَ عَلَيْهِم بِمُصَيْطِرٍ
verses.translation: Thou art not over them a warden.

verses.content: إِلَّا مَن تَوَلَّىٰ وَكَفَرَ
verses.translation: But whosoever will turn back and disbelieve -

verses.content: فَيُعَذِّبُهُ اللَّهُ الْعَذَابَ الْأَكْبَرَ
verses.translation: Him Allah shall torment with the greatest torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَيْنَا إِيَابَهُمْ
verses.translation: Verily Unto us is their reckoning.

verses.content: ثُمَّ إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا حِسَابَهُم
verses.translation: Then verily on us is their reckoning.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: By the dawn,

verses.content: وَلَيَالٍ عَشْرٍ
verses.translation: And by ten nights,

verses.content: وَالشَّفْعِ وَالْوَتْرِ
verses.translation: And by the even and the odd,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَسْرِ
verses.translation: And by the night when it departeth,

verses.content: هَلْ فِي ذَٰلِكَ قَسَمٌ لِّذِي حِجْرٍ
verses.translation: Indeed in that there is an oath for a man of sense.

verses.content: أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِعَادٍ
verses.translation: Bethinkest thou not in what wise thy Lord did with the 'A'ad:

verses.content: إِرَمَ ذَاتِ الْعِمَادِ
verses.translation: The people of many-columned lram.

verses.content: الَّتِي لَمْ يُخْلَقْ مِثْلُهَا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: The like of which was not built in the cities,

verses.content: وَثَمُودَ الَّذِينَ جَابُوا الصَّخْرَ بِالْوَادِ
verses.translation: And With Thamud who hewed out rocks in the vale,

verses.content: وَفِرْعَوْنَ ذِي الْأَوْتَادِ
verses.translation: And with Fir'awn, owner of the stakes -

verses.content: الَّذِينَ طَغَوْا فِي الْبِلَادِ
verses.translation: Who all waxed exorbitant in the cities,

verses.content: فَأَكْثَرُوا فِيهَا الْفَسَادَ
verses.translation: And multiplied therein corruption.

verses.content: فَصَبَّ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّكَ سَوْطَ عَذَابٍ
verses.translation: Wherefore thy Lord poured on them the scourge of His torment.

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّكَ لَبِالْمِرْصَادِ
verses.translation: Verily thy Lord is in an ambuscade,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْإِنسَانُ إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ رَبُّهُ فَأَكْرَمَهُ وَنَعَّمَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَكْرَمَنِ
verses.translation: As for man - when his Lord proveth him and so honoureth him and is bounteous Unto him, then he saith: 'my Lord hath honoured me,

verses.content: وَأَمَّا إِذَا مَا ابْتَلَاهُ فَقَدَرَ عَلَيْهِ رِزْقَهُ فَيَقُولُ رَبِّي أَهَانَنِ
verses.translation: And when He proveth him, and so stinteth Unto him his provision, he saith: 'my Lord hath despised me.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ بَل لَّا تُكْرِمُونَ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: By no means! But ye honour not the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا تَحَاضُّونَ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: Nor urge upon each other the feeding of the poor,

verses.content: وَتَأْكُلُونَ التُّرَاثَ أَكْلًا لَّمًّا
verses.translation: And devour the inheritance devouring greedily,

verses.content: وَتُحِبُّونَ الْمَالَ حُبًّا جَمًّا
verses.translation: And ye love riches with exceeding love.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِذَا دُكَّتِ الْأَرْضُ دَكًّا دَكًّا
verses.translation: By no means! when the earth shall be ground with grinding, grinding,

verses.content: وَجَاءَ رَبُّكَ وَالْمَلَكُ صَفًّا صَفًّا
verses.translation: And thy Lord shall come and the angels, rank on rank.

verses.content: وَجِيءَ يَوْمَئِذٍ بِجَهَنَّمَ ۚ يَوْمَئِذٍ يَتَذَكَّرُ الْإِنسَانُ وَأَنَّىٰ لَهُ الذِّكْرَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Hell on that Day shall be brought nigh. On that Day man shall remember, but how will remembrance avail him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ يَا لَيْتَنِي قَدَّمْتُ لِحَيَاتِي
verses.translation: He will say. 'would that I had sent before for this life of mine!

verses.content: فَيَوْمَئِذٍ لَّا يُعَذِّبُ عَذَابَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Wherefore on that Day none shall torment with His torment.

verses.content: وَلَا يُوثِقُ وَثَاقَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Nor shall any bind with His bond.

verses.content: يَا أَيَّتُهَا النَّفْسُ الْمُطْمَئِنَّةُ
verses.translation: O thou peaceful soul!

verses.content: ارْجِعِي إِلَىٰ رَبِّكِ رَاضِيَةً مَّرْضِيَّةً
verses.translation: Return Unto thine Lord well pleased and well-pleasing.

verses.content: فَادْخُلِي فِي عِبَادِي
verses.translation: Enter thou among My righteous bondmen!

verses.content: وَادْخُلِي جَنَّتِي
verses.translation: And enter thou My Garden.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَا أُقْسِمُ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: I swear by yonder city

verses.content: وَأَنتَ حِلٌّ بِهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ
verses.translation: And thou shalt be allowed in yonder city -

verses.content: وَوَالِدٍ وَمَا وَلَدَ
verses.translation: And by the begetter and that which he begat,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي كَبَدٍ
verses.translation: Assuredly We have created man in trouble.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّن يَقْدِرَ عَلَيْهِ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Deemest he that none will overpower him?

verses.content: يَقُولُ أَهْلَكْتُ مَالًا لُّبَدًا
verses.translation: He saith: 'I have wasted riches plenteous.

verses.content: أَيَحْسَبُ أَن لَّمْ يَرَهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Deemest he that none beholdeth him?

verses.content: أَلَمْ نَجْعَل لَّهُ عَيْنَيْنِ
verses.translation: Have We not, made for him two eyes

verses.content: وَلِسَانًا وَشَفَتَيْنِ
verses.translation: And a tongue and two lips,

verses.content: وَهَدَيْنَاهُ النَّجْدَيْنِ
verses.translation: And shown Unto him the two highways?

verses.content: فَلَا اقْتَحَمَ الْعَقَبَةَ
verses.translation: Yet he attempteth not the steep,

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْعَقَبَةُ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee understand that which the steep is?

verses.content: فَكُّ رَقَبَةٍ
verses.translation: It is freeing the neck,

verses.content: أَوْ إِطْعَامٌ فِي يَوْمٍ ذِي مَسْغَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or, feeding, in a day of privation,

verses.content: يَتِيمًا ذَا مَقْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: An orphan, of kin,

verses.content: أَوْ مِسْكِينًا ذَا مَتْرَبَةٍ
verses.translation: Or a poor man cleaving to the dust.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَانَ مِنَ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْمَرْحَمَةِ
verses.translation: Then he became of those who believed and enjoined on each other steadfastness and enjoined on each other compassion.

verses.content: أُولَـٰئِكَ أَصْحَابُ الْمَيْمَنَةِ
verses.translation: These are the fellows of the righthand.

verses.content: وَالَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا بِآيَاتِنَا هُمْ أَصْحَابُ الْمَشْأَمَةِ
verses.translation: And those who disbelieve Our signs - they are the fellows of the lefthand.

verses.content: عَلَيْهِمْ نَارٌ مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Over them shall be Fire closing round.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالشَّمْسِ وَضُحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the sun and his morning bright-ness,

verses.content: وَالْقَمَرِ إِذَا تَلَاهَا
verses.translation: By the moon, when she followeth him,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا جَلَّاهَا
verses.translation: By the day when it glorifieth him.

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَاهَا
verses.translation: By the night; when it envelopeth him,

verses.content: وَالسَّمَاءِ وَمَا بَنَاهَا
verses.translation: By the heaven and Him Who builded it,

verses.content: وَالْأَرْضِ وَمَا طَحَاهَا
verses.translation: By the earth and Him Who spread it forth,

verses.content: وَنَفْسٍ وَمَا سَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: By the soul and Him Who propertioned it,

verses.content: فَأَلْهَمَهَا فُجُورَهَا وَتَقْوَاهَا
verses.translation: And inspired it with the wickedness thereof and the piety thereof,

verses.content: قَدْ أَفْلَحَ مَن زَكَّاهَا
verses.translation: Surely blissful is he who hath cleansed, it,

verses.content: وَقَدْ خَابَ مَن دَسَّاهَا
verses.translation: And miserable is he who hath buried it.

verses.content: كَذَّبَتْ ثَمُودُ بِطَغْوَاهَا
verses.translation: Thamud belied in their exorbitance.

verses.content: إِذِ انبَعَثَ أَشْقَاهَا
verses.translation: What time the greatest wretch of them rose up.

verses.content: فَقَالَ لَهُمْ رَسُولُ اللَّهِ نَاقَةَ اللَّهِ وَسُقْيَاهَا
verses.translation: Then the apostle of Allah said Unto them: beware of the she-camel of Allah and her drink.

verses.content: فَكَذَّبُوهُ فَعَقَرُوهَا فَدَمْدَمَ عَلَيْهِمْ رَبُّهُم بِذَنبِهِمْ فَسَوَّاهَا
verses.translation: Then they belied him, and they hamstrung her; wherefore their Lord overwhelmed them for their crime, and made it equal.

verses.content: وَلَا يَخَافُ عُقْبَاهَا
verses.translation: And He feared not the consequence thereof

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا يَغْشَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night when it envelopeth,

verses.content: وَالنَّهَارِ إِذَا تَجَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: By the day when it appeareth in glory,

verses.content: وَمَا خَلَقَ الذَّكَرَ وَالْأُنثَىٰ
verses.translation: By Him Who hath created the male and the female,

verses.content: إِنَّ سَعْيَكُمْ لَشَتَّىٰ
verses.translation: Verily your endeavour is diverse.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَنْ أَعْطَىٰ وَاتَّقَىٰ
verses.translation: Then as for him who giveths and feareth Him.

verses.content: وَصَدَّقَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And testifieth to the Good,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْيُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Unto him therefore We shall indeed make easy the path to ease.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَن بَخِلَ وَاسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And as for him who stinteth and is heedless,

verses.content: وَكَذَّبَ بِالْحُسْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And who belieth the Good,

verses.content: فَسَنُيَسِّرُهُ لِلْعُسْرَىٰ
verses.translation: Unto him therefore We shall Indeed make easy the path to hardship.

verses.content: وَمَا يُغْنِي عَنْهُ مَالُهُ إِذَا تَرَدَّىٰ
verses.translation: And his substance will avail him not when he perisheth.

verses.content: إِنَّ عَلَيْنَا لَلْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Verify on us is the guidance

verses.content: وَإِنَّ لَنَا لَلْآخِرَةَ وَالْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And verify Ours is both the Hereafter and the life present.

verses.content: فَأَنذَرْتُكُمْ نَارًا تَلَظَّىٰ
verses.translation: Wherefore have warned you of Fire flaming,

verses.content: لَا يَصْلَاهَا إِلَّا الْأَشْقَى
verses.translation: None shall roast therein but the most wretched,

verses.content: الَّذِي كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who belieth and turneth away.

verses.content: وَسَيُجَنَّبُهَا الْأَتْقَى
verses.translation: And avoid it shall the most pious,

verses.content: الَّذِي يُؤْتِي مَالَهُ يَتَزَكَّىٰ
verses.translation: Who giveth away his substance that he may be cleansed,

verses.content: وَمَا لِأَحَدٍ عِندَهُ مِن نِّعْمَةٍ تُجْزَىٰ
verses.translation: And who hath no favour from anyone to recompense.

verses.content: إِلَّا ابْتِغَاءَ وَجْهِ رَبِّهِ الْأَعْلَىٰ
verses.translation: But only seeking the Countenance of his Lord the Most High.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And presently he shall become wellpleased.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالضُّحَىٰ
verses.translation: By the morning brightness,

verses.content: وَاللَّيْلِ إِذَا سَجَىٰ
verses.translation: By the night when it darkeneth,

verses.content: مَا وَدَّعَكَ رَبُّكَ وَمَا قَلَىٰ
verses.translation: Thy Lord hath not forsaken thee, nor is He displeased.

verses.content: وَلَلْآخِرَةُ خَيْرٌ لَّكَ مِنَ الْأُولَىٰ
verses.translation: And the Hereafter is indeed better Unto thee than the life present.

verses.content: وَلَسَوْفَ يُعْطِيكَ رَبُّكَ فَتَرْضَىٰ
verses.translation: And presently thy Lord shall give Unto thee so that thou shalt be be well-pleased.

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجِدْكَ يَتِيمًا فَآوَىٰ
verses.translation: Found He not thee an orphan, so He sheltered thee?

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ ضَالًّا فَهَدَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found thee wandering, so He guided thee,

verses.content: وَوَجَدَكَ عَائِلًا فَأَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: And He found thee destitute, so He enriched thee.

verses.content: فَأَمَّا الْيَتِيمَ فَلَا تَقْهَرْ
verses.translation: Wherefore as to the orphan, be thou not Unto him overbearing.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا السَّائِلَ فَلَا تَنْهَرْ
verses.translation: And as to the beggar, chide thou him not.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا بِنِعْمَةِ رَبِّكَ فَحَدِّثْ
verses.translation: And as to the favour of thine Lord discourse thou thereof.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ نَشْرَحْ لَكَ صَدْرَكَ
verses.translation: Have We not opened forth for thee thy breast?

verses.content: وَوَضَعْنَا عَنكَ وِزْرَكَ
verses.translation: And We have taken off from thee thy burthen,

verses.content: الَّذِي أَنقَضَ ظَهْرَكَ
verses.translation: Which weighed down thy back.

verses.content: وَرَفَعْنَا لَكَ ذِكْرَكَ
verses.translation: And We have upraised for thee thy renown.

verses.content: فَإِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Then verily along with every hardship is ease.

verses.content: إِنَّ مَعَ الْعُسْرِ يُسْرًا
verses.translation: Verily along with every hardship is ease.

verses.content: فَإِذَا فَرَغْتَ فَانصَبْ
verses.translation: Then when thou becometh relieved, toil;

verses.content: وَإِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ فَارْغَب
verses.translation: And Unto thine Lord, attend.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالتِّينِ وَالزَّيْتُونِ
verses.translation: By the fig, by the olive,

verses.content: وَطُورِ سِينِينَ
verses.translation: By Mount Sinai,

verses.content: وَهَـٰذَا الْبَلَدِ الْأَمِينِ
verses.translation: By the yonder secure city,

verses.content: لَقَدْ خَلَقْنَا الْإِنسَانَ فِي أَحْسَنِ تَقْوِيمٍ
verses.translation: Assuredly We have created man in goodliest mould,

verses.content: ثُمَّ رَدَدْنَاهُ أَسْفَلَ سَافِلِينَ
verses.translation: Thereafter We cause him to return to the lowest of the low,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ فَلَهُمْ أَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُونٍ
verses.translation: Save those who believe and work righteous Works. Theirs shall be hire unending.

verses.content: فَمَا يُكَذِّبُكَ بَعْدُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: What hencefort shall make thee belie the Requital?

verses.content: أَلَيْسَ اللَّهُ بِأَحْكَمِ الْحَاكِمِينَ
verses.translation: Is not Allah the Greatest of the rulers?

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ اقْرَأْ بِاسْمِ رَبِّكَ الَّذِي خَلَقَ
