verses.translation: Recite thou in the name of thy Lord Who hath created -

verses.content: خَلَقَ الْإِنسَانَ مِنْ عَلَقٍ
verses.translation: Hath created man from a clot!

verses.content: اقْرَأْ وَرَبُّكَ الْأَكْرَمُ
verses.translation: Recite thou: And thy Lord is the Most Bounteous,

verses.content: الَّذِي عَلَّمَ بِالْقَلَمِ
verses.translation: Who hath taught mankind by the pen -

verses.content: عَلَّمَ الْإِنسَانَ مَا لَمْ يَعْلَمْ
verses.translation: Hath taught man that which he knew not.

verses.content: كَلَّا إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَيَطْغَىٰ
verses.translation: By no means: Verily man exorbitateth.

verses.content: أَن رَّآهُ اسْتَغْنَىٰ
verses.translation: As he bethinkest himself selfsufficient.

verses.content: إِنَّ إِلَىٰ رَبِّكَ الرُّجْعَىٰ
verses.translation: Verily Unto thy Lord is the return.

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يَنْهَىٰ
verses.translation: Bethinkest thou him who forbiddeth,

verses.content: عَبْدًا إِذَا صَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: A bondman of Ours when he prayeth *

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَانَ عَلَى الْهُدَىٰ
verses.translation: Bethinkest thou, if he is himself guided,

verses.content: أَوْ أَمَرَ بِالتَّقْوَىٰ
verses.translation: Or he commandeth piety?

verses.content: أَرَأَيْتَ إِن كَذَّبَ وَتَوَلَّىٰ
verses.translation: Bethinkest thou, if he belieth and turneth away?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَعْلَم بِأَنَّ اللَّهَ يَرَىٰ
verses.translation: Knoweth he not that Allah beholdeth?

verses.content: كَلَّا لَئِن لَّمْ يَنتَهِ لَنَسْفَعًا بِالنَّاصِيَةِ
verses.translation: By no means! If he desist not We shall seize and deal him by the forelock -

verses.content: نَاصِيَةٍ كَاذِبَةٍ خَاطِئَةٍ
verses.translation: A forelock, lying, sinning.

verses.content: فَلْيَدْعُ نَادِيَهُ
verses.translation: Then, let him call his assembly,

verses.content: سَنَدْعُ الزَّبَانِيَةَ
verses.translation: We also shall call the infernal guards.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَا تُطِعْهُ وَاسْجُدْ وَاقْتَرِب ۩
verses.translation: By no means! Obey not thou him. Continue to adore, and continue to draw nigh.

verses.content: بِّسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَنزَلْنَاهُ فِي لَيْلَةِ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: Verily We! We have sent it down on the night of Power.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee know that which the night of Power is?

verses.content: لَيْلَةُ الْقَدْرِ خَيْرٌ مِّنْ أَلْفِ شَهْرٍ
verses.translation: The night of Power is better than a thousand months.

verses.content: تَنَزَّلُ الْمَلَائِكَةُ وَالرُّوحُ فِيهَا بِإِذْنِ رَبِّهِم مِّن كُلِّ أَمْرٍ
verses.translation: The angels and the spirit descend therein by the command of their Lord with His decrees for every affair.

verses.content: سَلَامٌ هِيَ حَتَّىٰ مَطْلَعِ الْفَجْرِ
verses.translation: It is all peace, until the rising of the dawn.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لَمْ يَكُنِ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ مُنفَكِّينَ حَتَّىٰ تَأْتِيَهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: Those who disbelieved from among the People of the Book and the associaters could not break off, until there had come Unto them the evidence.

verses.content: رَسُولٌ مِّنَ اللَّهِ يَتْلُو صُحُفًا مُّطَهَّرَةً
verses.translation: An apostle from Allah rehearsing Writs cleansed.

verses.content: فِيهَا كُتُبٌ قَيِّمَةٌ
verses.translation: Wherein are discourses eternal.

verses.content: وَمَا تَفَرَّقَ الَّذِينَ أُوتُوا الْكِتَابَ إِلَّا مِن بَعْدِ مَا جَاءَتْهُمُ الْبَيِّنَةُ
verses.translation: And those who are vouchsafed the Book divided not save after there had come Unto them the evidence.

verses.content: وَمَا أُمِرُوا إِلَّا لِيَعْبُدُوا اللَّهَ مُخْلِصِينَ لَهُ الدِّينَ حُنَفَاءَ وَيُقِيمُوا الصَّلَاةَ وَيُؤْتُوا الزَّكَاةَ ۚ وَذَٰلِكَ دِينُ الْقَيِّمَةِ
verses.translation: And they were commanded not but that they should worship Allah, keeping religion pure for him, as upright men, and that they should establish prayer and give the poor-rate, And that is the right religion.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ كَفَرُوا مِنْ أَهْلِ الْكِتَابِ وَالْمُشْرِكِينَ فِي نَارِ جَهَنَّمَ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا ۚ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ شَرُّ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Verily those who disbelieve from among the people of the Book and the associaters shall be cast into the Hell-fire, as abiders therein. These! they are the worst of the creation.

verses.content: إِنَّ الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ أُولَـٰئِكَ هُمْ خَيْرُ الْبَرِيَّةِ
verses.translation: Verily those who believe and work righteous works - these! they are the best of the creation.

verses.content: جَزَاؤُهُمْ عِندَ رَبِّهِمْ جَنَّاتُ عَدْنٍ تَجْرِي مِن تَحْتِهَا الْأَنْهَارُ خَالِدِينَ فِيهَا أَبَدًا ۖ رَّضِيَ اللَّهُ عَنْهُمْ وَرَضُوا عَنْهُ ۚ ذَٰلِكَ لِمَنْ خَشِيَ رَبَّهُ
verses.translation: Their recompense with their Lord shall be Gardens Everlasting, whereunder rivers flow - as abiders therein for evermore. Well-pleases will be Allah with them and well-pleased will be they with Him, That is for him who feareth his Lord.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا زُلْزِلَتِ الْأَرْضُ زِلْزَالَهَا
verses.translation: When the earth is shaken by the shaking thereof,

verses.content: وَأَخْرَجَتِ الْأَرْضُ أَثْقَالَهَا
verses.translation: And the earth bringeth forth her burthens,

verses.content: وَقَالَ الْإِنسَانُ مَا لَهَا
verses.translation: And man saith: what aileth her?

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ تُحَدِّثُ أَخْبَارَهَا
verses.translation: On that Day she will tell out the tidings thereof.

verses.content: بِأَنَّ رَبَّكَ أَوْحَىٰ لَهَا
verses.translation: Because thy Lord will inspire her.

verses.content: يَوْمَئِذٍ يَصْدُرُ النَّاسُ أَشْتَاتًا لِّيُرَوْا أَعْمَالَهُمْ
verses.translation: On that Day mankind will proceed in bands, that they may be shewn their works.

verses.content: فَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ خَيْرًا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: Then whosoever hath worked good of an atom's weight shall behold it

verses.content: وَمَن يَعْمَلْ مِثْقَالَ ذَرَّةٍ شَرًّا يَرَهُ
verses.translation: And whosoever hath worked ill Of an atom's weight shall behold it.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَادِيَاتِ ضَبْحًا
verses.translation: By the chargers panting,

verses.content: فَالْمُورِيَاتِ قَدْحًا
verses.translation: And striking off fire by dashing their hoofs.

verses.content: فَالْمُغِيرَاتِ صُبْحًا
verses.translation: And raiding at dawn

verses.content: فَأَثَرْنَ بِهِ نَقْعًا
verses.translation: And therein raising dust.

verses.content: فَوَسَطْنَ بِهِ جَمْعًا
verses.translation: And cleaving their way therein into the host,

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لِرَبِّهِ لَكَنُودٌ
verses.translation: Verily man is Unto his Lord ungrateful.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ عَلَىٰ ذَٰلِكَ لَشَهِيدٌ
verses.translation: And verily to that he is witness.

verses.content: وَإِنَّهُ لِحُبِّ الْخَيْرِ لَشَدِيدٌ
verses.translation: And verily in the love of wealth he is vehement,

verses.content: أَفَلَا يَعْلَمُ إِذَا بُعْثِرَ مَا فِي الْقُبُورِ
verses.translation: Knoweth he not - when that which is in the graves, shall be ransacked?

verses.content: وَحُصِّلَ مَا فِي الصُّدُورِ
verses.translation: And there shall be brounht to light that which is in the breasts?

verses.content: إِنَّ رَبَّهُم بِهِمْ يَوْمَئِذٍ لَّخَبِيرٌ
verses.translation: Verily their Lord on that Day will be of them Aware.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: The Striking!

verses.content: مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What is the Striking?

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْقَارِعَةُ
verses.translation: What shall Make thee know that which the Striking is?

verses.content: يَوْمَ يَكُونُ النَّاسُ كَالْفَرَاشِ الْمَبْثُوثِ
verses.translation: A Day whereon mankind shall become as moths scattered,

verses.content: وَتَكُونُ الْجِبَالُ كَالْعِهْنِ الْمَنفُوشِ
verses.translation: And the mountains shall become as wool carded,

verses.content: فَأَمَّا مَن ثَقُلَتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: Then as for him whose balances are heavy,

verses.content: فَهُوَ فِي عِيشَةٍ رَّاضِيَةٍ
verses.translation: He shall be in a lifewell-pleasing.

verses.content: وَأَمَّا مَنْ خَفَّتْ مَوَازِينُهُ
verses.translation: And as for him whose balances are light,

verses.content: فَأُمُّهُ هَاوِيَةٌ
verses.translation: His dwelling shall be the Abyss.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا هِيَهْ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee know that which she is?

verses.content: نَارٌ حَامِيَةٌ
verses.translation: A Fire vehemently hot!

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلْهَاكُمُ التَّكَاثُرُ
verses.translation: The emulous desire of abundance engrosseth you,

verses.content: حَتَّىٰ زُرْتُمُ الْمَقَابِرَ
verses.translation: Until ye visit the graves.

verses.content: كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Lo! presently ye shall know.

verses.content: ثُمَّ كَلَّا سَوْفَ تَعْلَمُونَ
verses.translation: Again lo! presently ye shall know.

verses.content: كَلَّا لَوْ تَعْلَمُونَ عِلْمَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Lo! would that ye knew now with the surety of knowledge!

verses.content: لَتَرَوُنَّ الْجَحِيمَ
verses.translation: Surely ye shall behold theScorch.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتَرَوُنَّهَا عَيْنَ الْيَقِينِ
verses.translation: Then ye shall surely beholdwith the surety of vision.

verses.content: ثُمَّ لَتُسْأَلُنَّ يَوْمَئِذٍ عَنِ النَّعِيمِ
verses.translation: Then, on that Day, ye shall surely be asked of the delights.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَالْعَصْرِ
verses.translation: By the time,

verses.content: إِنَّ الْإِنسَانَ لَفِي خُسْرٍ
verses.translation: Verily man is in loss,

verses.content: إِلَّا الَّذِينَ آمَنُوا وَعَمِلُوا الصَّالِحَاتِ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالْحَقِّ وَتَوَاصَوْا بِالصَّبْرِ
verses.translation: But not those who themselves believe and work righteous works, and enjoin upon each other the truth, and enjoin upon each other endurance.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ وَيْلٌ لِّكُلِّ هُمَزَةٍ لُّمَزَةٍ
verses.translation: Woe Unto every slanderer, traducer,

verses.content: الَّذِي جَمَعَ مَالًا وَعَدَّدَهُ
verses.translation: Who amasseth wealth; and counteth it.

verses.content: يَحْسَبُ أَنَّ مَالَهُ أَخْلَدَهُ
verses.translation: He bethinketh that his wealth shall abide for him.

verses.content: كَلَّا ۖ لَيُنبَذَنَّ فِي الْحُطَمَةِ
verses.translation: By no means! He shall surely be cast into the Crushing Fire.

verses.content: وَمَا أَدْرَاكَ مَا الْحُطَمَةُ
verses.translation: And what shall make thee know that which the Crushing Fire is?

verses.content: نَارُ اللَّهِ الْمُوقَدَةُ
verses.translation: Fire of Allah, Kindled,

verses.content: الَّتِي تَطَّلِعُ عَلَى الْأَفْئِدَةِ
verses.translation: Which mounteth up to the hearts.

verses.content: إِنَّهَا عَلَيْهِم مُّؤْصَدَةٌ
verses.translation: Verily it shall close upon them,

verses.content: فِي عَمَدٍ مُّمَدَّدَةٍ
verses.translation: In pillars stretched forth.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَلَمْ تَرَ كَيْفَ فَعَلَ رَبُّكَ بِأَصْحَابِ الْفِيلِ
verses.translation: Hast thou not observed what wise thy Lord dealt with the fellows of the elephant?

verses.content: أَلَمْ يَجْعَلْ كَيْدَهُمْ فِي تَضْلِيلٍ
verses.translation: Put He not their stratagem to straying.

verses.content: وَأَرْسَلَ عَلَيْهِمْ طَيْرًا أَبَابِيلَ
verses.translation: And He sent against them birds in flocks.

verses.content: تَرْمِيهِم بِحِجَارَةٍ مِّن سِجِّيلٍ
verses.translation: They hurled upon them stones of baked clay;

verses.content: فَجَعَلَهُمْ كَعَصْفٍ مَّأْكُولٍ
verses.translation: Then He rendered them as stubble devoured.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ لِإِيلَافِ قُرَيْشٍ
verses.translation: For the keeping of the Quraish

verses.content: إِيلَافِهِمْ رِحْلَةَ الشِّتَاءِ وَالصَّيْفِ
verses.translation: For their keeping to the journey in the winter and the summer-

verses.content: فَلْيَعْبُدُوا رَبَّ هَـٰذَا الْبَيْتِ
verses.translation: Let them worship the Lord of this House,

verses.content: الَّذِي أَطْعَمَهُم مِّن جُوعٍ وَآمَنَهُم مِّنْ خَوْفٍ
verses.translation: Who hath fed them against hunger; and hath rendered them secure from fear.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ أَرَأَيْتَ الَّذِي يُكَذِّبُ بِالدِّينِ
verses.translation: Beholdest thou him who belieth the Requital?

verses.content: فَذَٰلِكَ الَّذِي يَدُعُّ الْيَتِيمَ
verses.translation: It is he who pusheth away the orphan,

verses.content: وَلَا يَحُضُّ عَلَىٰ طَعَامِ الْمِسْكِينِ
verses.translation: And urgeth not the feeding of the poor,

verses.content: فَوَيْلٌ لِّلْمُصَلِّينَ
verses.translation: Woe, therefore, Unto such performers of prayer.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ عَن صَلَاتِهِمْ سَاهُونَ
verses.translation: As are of their prayer careless.

verses.content: الَّذِينَ هُمْ يُرَاءُونَ
verses.translation: They who would be seen,

verses.content: وَيَمْنَعُونَ الْمَاعُونَ
verses.translation: And who withholds even common necessaries.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِنَّا أَعْطَيْنَاكَ الْكَوْثَرَ
verses.translation: Verily We! We have given thee Kauthar.

verses.content: فَصَلِّ لِرَبِّكَ وَانْحَرْ
verses.translation: Wherefore pray thou Unto thy Lord, and sacrifice.

verses.content: إِنَّ شَانِئَكَ هُوَ الْأَبْتَرُ
verses.translation: Verily it is thy traducer who shall be tail-less.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ يَا أَيُّهَا الْكَافِرُونَ
verses.translation: Say thou: O ye infidels!

verses.content: لَا أَعْبُدُ مَا تَعْبُدُونَ
verses.translation: I worship not, that which ye worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor are ye the worshippers of that which I worship.

verses.content: وَلَا أَنَا عَابِدٌ مَّا عَبَدتُّمْ
verses.translation: And I shall not be a worshipper of that which ye have worshipped,

verses.content: وَلَا أَنتُمْ عَابِدُونَ مَا أَعْبُدُ
verses.translation: Nor will ye be worshippers of that which I worship,

verses.content: لَكُمْ دِينُكُمْ وَلِيَ دِينِ
verses.translation: Yours shall be your requital, and mine shall be my requital.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ إِذَا جَاءَ نَصْرُ اللَّهِ وَالْفَتْحُ
verses.translation: When there cometh the succour of Allah and the victory,

verses.content: وَرَأَيْتَ النَّاسَ يَدْخُلُونَ فِي دِينِ اللَّهِ أَفْوَاجًا
verses.translation: And thou beholdest mankind entering the religion of Allah in crowds,

verses.content: فَسَبِّحْ بِحَمْدِ رَبِّكَ وَاسْتَغْفِرْهُ ۚ إِنَّهُ كَانَ تَوَّابًا
verses.translation: Then hallow the praise of thy Lord, and ask forgiveness of Him. Verily He is ever Relenting.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ تَبَّتْ يَدَا أَبِي لَهَبٍ وَتَبَّ
verses.translation: Perish the two hands of Abu Lahab, and perish he!

verses.content: مَا أَغْنَىٰ عَنْهُ مَالُهُ وَمَا كَسَبَ
verses.translation: His substance availed him not, nor that which he earned.

verses.content: سَيَصْلَىٰ نَارًا ذَاتَ لَهَبٍ
verses.translation: Anon he shall roast into Fire having flame.

verses.content: وَامْرَأَتُهُ حَمَّالَةَ الْحَطَبِ
verses.translation: And his wife also: the firewood carrier;

verses.content: فِي جِيدِهَا حَبْلٌ مِّن مَّسَدٍ
verses.translation: On her neck shall be a cord of twisted fibre.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ هُوَ اللَّهُ أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: Say thou: He is Allah, the One!

verses.content: اللَّهُ الصَّمَدُ
verses.translation: Allah, the Independent,

verses.content: لَمْ يَلِدْ وَلَمْ يُولَدْ
verses.translation: He begetteth not, nor Was He begotten.

verses.content: وَلَمْ يَكُن لَّهُ كُفُوًا أَحَدٌ
verses.translation: And there hath never been co-equal with Him anyone.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ الْفَلَقِ
verses.translation: Say thou; I seek refuge with the Lord of the daybreak.

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ مَا خَلَقَ
verses.translation: From the evil of that which He hath created,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ غَاسِقٍ إِذَا وَقَبَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the darken when it cometh,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ النَّفَّاثَاتِ فِي الْعُقَدِ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the women blowers upon knots,

verses.content: وَمِن شَرِّ حَاسِدٍ إِذَا حَسَدَ
verses.translation: And from the evil of the envier when he envieth.

verses.content: بِسْمِ اللَّهِ الرَّحْمَـٰنِ الرَّحِيمِ قُلْ أَعُوذُ بِرَبِّ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Say thou: I seek refuge with the Lord of mankind,

verses.content: مَلِكِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: The King of mankind,

verses.content: إِلَـٰهِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: The God of mankind,

verses.content: مِن شَرِّ الْوَسْوَاسِ الْخَنَّاسِ
verses.translation: From the evil of the sneaking whisperer

verses.content: الَّذِي يُوَسْوِسُ فِي صُدُورِ النَّاسِ
verses.translation: Who whispereth Unto the breasts of mankind,

verses.content: مِنَ الْجِنَّةِ وَالنَّاسِ
verses.translation: Whether of Jinn or of mankind.
